comments: I hope you take the time to read.   This game is amazing, and it just keeps getting better. I do wish you would change the video knives to apples or video. Now I have nothing to spend apples on.  But here is what i really wanted to say i really like this company and the games you put out to your users. I'm newly paralyzed and I been well adapting to my new life and because my hands dont work like they used to these games kept my mind busy and has helped me. I own alot of your games and have spent alot trying to help. I wish I had more to unlock things in time. But Thank you very much.

The game sucks it's alwful. It's gliching non stop for your bad. There are ADS everywhere! Ketchapp you getting worse and worse. There are ads of stupid games everywhere. What a game maker will pay to another game to show them in ADS! That makes the game in the ad even worse. Please ketchapp I was a big fan of you but you made your games so STUPIT. PLEASE FIX YOUR GAMES!

This skill-based time waster would be better without the hyper-agressive advertising. First you have the constant banner ad at the bottom of the screen. That's forgiveable because it's out of the way and doesn't really affect gameplay. It's the fail-state adevertisements that constantly interrupt retrys that will irritate even the most casual of gamers.   The only people writing good reviews for this game are bot accounts.

I like the game, BUT it is glitchy. Most of the time when I hit "continue" to watch an ad for longer gameplay it freezes, so I have to close the app and start over. When I open the app and start playing the first round, an ad pops up and I inevitably click on it because I'm in the middle of playing the round. Please fix these issues, and I'll try to remember to rate this higher once they're fixed.

Ads interrupt gameplay and are extremely aggravating. The video that you have to watch to continue your gameplay never works. The game crashes when xp increases. I personally dislike this game, and it would be better if these issues were resolved. Thank you for taking time out of your day to read this review.

Deleted all my data with no reason. Had a bunch of Legendaries and Rares that have now been deleted. I put a lot of time into this game, and even bought the ad-free package. If you don't want a load of wasted time, don't download this app.  Edit- Updated the app and levelled up a bit. The game crashes every time I get a free revive. Still a massive waste of time.

description: Splash of Fun Coloring Game is a game that gives you the option to have fun with traditional painting tools like paints, crayons or felt pens. Kids, together with their parents, can create their own little masterpieces, creating similar effects to the ones acquired on paper. The game was created with the youngest in mind (tested on two- and three-year-olds), but older kids and grown-ups will also have lots of color-splashing fun here.We can play in the following way: - we color pre-prepared images selected from the library,- or we create our own "masterpieces" using provided painting supplies.Little kids will find here many pictures to color with a bucket tool that fills large areas at once. Older kids and adults can try drawing their own creatures and scenes, and color them with a wash of paint, crayon or spray paint. We can also add highlights and shadows, correct mistakes with eraser, use undo and redo functionality or change the size of our preferred coloring tool.We can pick colors from two color palettes: - basic (18 colors)- extended - over 200 colors.The images are grouped in the following categories:- for girls,- dinosaurs, animals and nature,- fruit and vegetables,- underwater,- vehicles.Additional features:- save your own projects and return to them later on,- share your saved images through e-mail or on Facebook,- return to the project you're working on whenever you want,- listen to the pleasant music in the background (with an option to turn it off).
descriptionHTML:
Splash of Fun Coloring Game is a game that gives you the option to have fun with traditional painting tools like paints, crayons or felt pens. Kids, together with their parents, can create their own little masterpieces, creating similar effects to the ones acquired on paper. The game was created with the youngest in mind (tested on two- and three-year-olds), but older kids and grown-ups will also have lots of color-splashing fun here.

We can play in the following way:
- we color pre-prepared images selected from the library,
- or we create our own "masterpieces" using provided painting supplies.
Little kids will find here many pictures to color with a bucket tool that fills large areas at once. Older kids and adults can try drawing their own creatures and scenes, and color them with a wash of paint, crayon or spray paint. We can also add highlights and shadows, correct mistakes with eraser, use undo and redo functionality or change the size of our preferred coloring tool.

We can pick colors from two color palettes:
- basic (18 colors)
- extended - over 200 colors.

The images are grouped in the following categories:
- for girls,
- dinosaurs, animals and nature,
- fruit and vegetables,
- underwater,
- vehicles.

Additional features:
- save your own projects and return to them later on,
- share your saved images through e-mail or on Facebook,
- return to the project you're working on whenever you want,
- listen to the pleasant music in the background (with an option to turn it off).
developerAddress:
Roweckiego-Grota 3E
42-224 Czƒôstochowa
summary: Kids coloring games with the option to create their own images.
title: Splash of Fun Coloring Game

comments: GAH! They've over complicated this game with unnecessary graphics and gifts and prizes etc. I couldn't even figure out how to get into the levels for a while haha. I'm sure if I had the patience to go through and understand it properly it would be fine, but I didn't want to. Old angry birds setup was better. Wish you didn't change it. Uninstalled after 1 day.

I really think the tower is rigged. 1 in 4 chance of getting the pig but it seems to happen ALL the time. Cant get past the 6th or 7th floor. However if you spend lots o money to buy gems I guess it can be done. Not for me I am out.

Can no longer watch ads to get an extra rewards chest plus, I logged in for 90 days and did not get my legendary chest. My screen froze up when I hit the claim button and had to restart my game. Now my chest is gone and the next level has appeared without me being able to chose what I wanted from the chest.

Caution! Needed access to my personal files including photos to play the game.  I denied and could not start the game unless it had access. Uninstalling after this review.  Don't let programmers and hackers get a hold of your personal files!

Graphics are good, game play can be lame at times when you get birds that are incapable of completing the level. You can't buy the game and that bothers me. I spent $20, (to support the effort) but am trying to keep it at that.  Others have spent $100 and more. Greed ruins this game. Just finished a level that was designed to be beat only by spending money. Spent hours trying but finally paid and beat it. The game play is not consistent. If you have a bad day it will let you win, if you're winning, suddenly an opponent that should never be able to beat you, kicks your ass when you've played perfectly.

It won't let me watch videos. Every time I click on the TV to watch a video for a free bird or arena ticket, it restart the game instead and I lose a life. I hope this gets fixed because other then that it's an addictive game. When the Glitch is fixed I will give a better rating.
description: Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!It‚Äôs the ultimate slingshot strategy ‚Äì YOU choose which bird to fling next! ‚ÄúBut that makes it easier, right?‚Äù WRONG! You‚Äôll need to choose wisely if you‚Äôre going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. descriptionHTML:
Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?

CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!
It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!

NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!
You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.

SPECTACULAR SPELLS!
Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!
Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!

DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!
There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.

I really like this app and I have fun playing it :D I love the concept of collecting pets while running and it motivates me to collect all the pets I can possibly get! However I have a problem. When I first open the app it's all fine and it loads and I can play. However the moment I close the app then open it again it won't load. It'll just stay on that screen with the tiger and panda. I tried undownloading and downloading again and it worked when I first opened the app but when I close out it won't load the 2nd time  I opened the app.

Hello! Can you please get back to me with my question? I have been playing this game for only two days and already have lots of pets tagged ‚ù§. Let me say, this game is so cute, fun, and addicting! Right now I have been trying to figure out what my friends time zone is so I changed the time and time zone,  and I thought all was well. Unfortunately, when I got back onto Dash Tag I still had my unlocked pet, Smoky, as my character but it gave me the tutorial pop up. When I closed the game's tab and reopened the game, it had Sparky and I had lost all my coins, gems, and pets. Please help, it would be appreciated! Thanks!

The game is nice (for graphics and stuffs) but, it has many lags and bugs when i wanted to move my pet when running... and also.. limited ads (trying to play game for free first) so i couldn't even reach 10000 score :(  yeah this game is actually like subway surfers but its pets... it has rare pets... and idk whats the apple or milk equipment does.... i dont see any effects when i equip 1 tho-  you guys can make this game better tho. i kinda wait till the games better and I'll reinstall again

Hello Wildworks! Please read this! I have recently downloaded the game on my Chromebook, which is the only android I own that has the Play Store on it. It would be easier for me if I could get it on my Kindle Fire. Please make Dash Tap avalible to the amazon app store as soon as possible! I would rate 5 stars on there, otherwise my review is a 4 stars. In otherwords, the game is great! It isn't as challenging for me since I already play many games that are like this. Since it's more challenging on the chromebook, I'm still stuck on the first pet you have at the start.  As I said before, please make the app avalible for the amazon app store soon! Thank you!

Although the game is fun, cute, and addicting, there are some things that don't really function. For instance, I'll watch an ad (particularly an ad for deal dash) and it won't continue my round. It works for all ads except deal dash. It also has some obstacles in the Coral canyons setting that are difficult to pass. Ideally, most people playing the game are young at age and I personally feel like the game is a little bit too hard. Overall, it's a good game, but I think some adjustments are necessary.

descriptionHTML:
PETS ON THE LOOSE!

Run, dash, slide, and jump your way through forest treetops, redrock canyons, and other challenging terrain! Collect dozens of pets, complete daily missions, and unlock tons of fun goodies. Welcome to Dash Tag, the best endless runner game! Choose your favorite pet and get ready to run with your friends and evade capture by Misha!

• Collect dozens of rare and unique pets
• Play as every pet you collect
• Unlock power-ups, outfits, and stats
• Speed through levels in pet cars
• Endless runner with new missions every day
• Free to play
• Easy to learn

Use the coins and emeralds you collect to purchase loads of upgrades like costumes, power-ups, and even pet cars! The farther you run, the more you collect. And the more you collect, the more fun you'll have!

So whether you prefer to scamper, scurry, or scuttle, join the fun of this amazing pet adventure today!

Experience the speed and intensity of Ice Hockey with the return of the HOCKEY NATIONS franchise! Deliver those big hits, wind up a howitzer of a slap-shot and aim a well-timed wrister while playing in 7 thrilling tournaments in HOCKEY NATIONS 18.

HEATED RIVALRY
Some of the greatest hockey rivalries battle it out in the RIVALS SERIES. Take control of the game and earn those bragging rights with 50 intense challenges!

DREAM OF GOLD
What better way to enter the world of International Hockey than skating out for your team in the Winter Games! Go stick to stick with some of the greatest teams and come away with the gold medal!

3 ON 3 SUPER SERIES
Six club teams from USA, CANADA and RUSSIA will battle it out to be crowned the 3 ON 3 SUPER SERIES Champions. Which team will you guide to the finals?

LIVE GAMES
Join others and compete in regular LIVE GAMES. Earn points for your team and lead them to victory. Prove you're the one of the best as you climb to the top of the influencers leaderboard.

comments: I think this game is brilliant. An absolute pleasure to play and I never get bored. This game should be voted one of the best games ever. Obviously I like other games but this is a whole different story. I just wanted to say please make it so u can join lower levels friends? I can't join my sister and were only five levels apart.

I LOVE this game My only complaint is in campaign mode it's said more worlds coming soon for YEARS!!! If they're not going to add a world eny time soon  they should at least change the coming soon part. But overall this is a good game and it seems like Cubic Games really care about what the consumers think.

This used to be really cool. If you want to be strong buy gem weapons. It is too hard too earn coins or.gems. Also your opponents must be with same armor or level. I once fought a guy with the minigun shotgun and diamond armor and before I rekt everyone with the demoman but now it sucks

This game is so good! I have played this game when it was in its early stages, and it was pretty good. Now it has gotten even better than before, with lots of multiplayer game options and lots of weapons and gadgets to choose from. There is one problem, which is when I got this game about a month or two ago, the prices to upgrade guns were pretty low for coins but ok for gems, but now they are ok for coins and WAY TO MUCH for gems, so I ask of you developers to please decrease the amount of gems it takes to upgrade gem bought guns.

This game is the best I have ever played on a phone tons of maps, game modes, hundreds of guns, different tools, gear, and lots of skins. There is just so many things you can do. I also like it because it is a challenge something I would play. That's why I rated this game 5 stars.

I don't like this update. Why does it cost so much to upgrade  weapons 2 more damage higher. And I don't like the fact that all the weapons that have low stars are nerfed. When I was on level 6 the hellraiser was a beast. Then when I got to level 7 I it wasn't as good, so I tried to upgrade it. BUT the price cost 120 coins. I am really disappointed about this. I played this game for 2 years and it sad to see how hard it is to win. They only want money that's it. Make your game better and fair. It's so unbalanced.

descriptionHTML:
Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games! Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.

This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield! It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players!

*** MULTIPLAYER MODES***

Deathmatch mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE and local.
• unique maps of various shapes and sizes.
• Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.
• Up to 8 players in one game.
• Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle!
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!

*** COOPERATIVE MODE ***
Cooperative mode features:
• Up to 4 Players in one game.
• Chat is available as well!
• 8 special maps.
• Hardcore gameplay.
• Coins as a prize for top results.


*** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***
In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!
Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.

New cool features in a campaign mode:
• A new training camp for first-timers.
• More detailed graphics.
• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds.
• Cool new songs
• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!

Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!

Main Features of a campaign mode:
• Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.
• A lot of absolutely different maps.
• Many types of zombies and enemies.
• Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.
• Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!
• Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.

*** SKINS MAKER ***
Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!

Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!

comments: I Love Gardenscapes and It Is Fun Way to Be Creative.  A Recent Update has Made it Definitely Better.  The Support Team Has Been Exceptional With Quick Responses and Answers!  There is Room for Improvement in the Amount of Coins Obtained in Completing Tasks, as Well as Eliminating Repetitious Tasks Requiring More Moves.

Should make the money in higher value as it is very hard to accumulate.  Poor marks because it takes so much of your hard earned levels and drops you down the ranks if you don't solve immediately.  I was at ruby level and have so many points taken away now I am back to silver....uninstalling thanks for nothing.

I really enjoy this game, its quite addictive but i find it very satisfying. The only problem with it is that once you get into higher levels (i'm at 300) you start needing tons of stars for small things and for instance to get rid of one stump takes like 8 stars. Anyway I like the game and am going to keep playing it.

I use the love this game and have played it for months, but the lasted update ruined it for me. Every time you don't finish a level it asked you a second time if your sure to want to lose this or  that. I don't apreciate the guilt trip to try and get money out of me. It's dispicable and unethical!

If I could give it 0 stars I would. There is no way to contact support and you can't restart the game. I got a bad download and now I'm stuck with it. My personal information should not be part of playing a match 3 game anyhow. Game crashes at least once a day and my controls only work about 60% of the time. Horrible experience! Playrix should be ashamed of their programming here.

The game is awfully hard for what is essentially a match 3 game. For a game that is supposed to be as much about the storyline as it is about the matching, it sure doesn't want you to advance that storyline. It's more about the very obvious money grab than it is about game play. Do yourself a favor and don't waste the space downloading this game. There are much more enjoyable match 3 games on Play. There's a reason it's the #3 grossing game on Google play. It's all about how much you are willing to spend, not about the actual play.
description: Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory. Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free! The game features:‚óè Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!‚óè Hundreds of unique match-3 levels‚óè Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with‚óè An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up‚óè An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything‚óè Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more‚óè A community that comes first ‚Äî be neighbors with your Facebook friends!‚óè A super addicting game you can even play offline! Gardenscapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Gardenscapes? Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GardenscapesInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenscapes_mobile/Twitter: https://twitter.com/garden_scapes Questions? Contact our tech support at gardenscapes@playrix.com
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory.

Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free!

The game features:
● Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!
● Hundreds of unique match-3 levels
● Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with
● An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up
● An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything
● Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more
● A community that comes first — be neighbors with your Facebook friends!
● A super addicting game you can even play offline!

Gardenscapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.

Enjoying Gardenscapes? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Gardenscapes
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenscapes_mobile/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/garden_scapes

Questions? Contact our tech support at gardenscapes@playrix.com
developerAddress: The Digital Hub, Dublin 8, Ireland
recentChanges: - Beat special levels to carry on with holiday tasks and get prizes
- Enjoy sketches with the Easter bunny
A new area across the river
- Dive into adventures: find a manuscript and reveal who lived in an abandoned house!
- According to legend, there‚Äôs a ghost living in the garden!
- Don‚Äôt get tangled up in a new Rope element
- Keep an eye on events in a new in-game tab
- Get more rewards for your restoration efforts
summary: Get ready to be introduced to a wonderful garden!
title: Gardenscapes

comments: I dont know why but I cant even enter the game. It asked me to install 300mb+ of downloadable content but when i press Ok it says that an error occurred. I love this old school game but why doesnt this game work? Pls fix this asap.
Just updated it and my whole account got wiped. Tried logging in with facebook or google account all is wipe. Please get it done asap or i would like a refund.
Crash, crash, crash, crash , crash. I like the game, but it crashes SO MUCH. Maybe it's my phone, idk. I haven't been able to access the store either to buy new cards.
391.191MB of new data available for download. I received error when it reach 90%. Waste of time.
Game us great, however, whenever against real time players, it will always disconnect me from the game even though in open space and having 4G+ connection
After login, the screen is black then it crash. I'm using wifi, lenovo vibe k5 plus.

descriptionHTML:
Rebirth of MapleStory From RPG to Real-time PVP!
Duel with Cards, Win with Strategy!

Witness a fresh new take on MapleStory's heroes in MapleStory Blitz!

ㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡ
Enjoy the Fairy King's blessings while raining arrows upon the battlefield, Mercedes!
What he wants, he steals! Maple's master of Subterfuge, Phantom!
A charismatic captain set on destroying everything that stands in her way, Kyrin!

comments: This used to be my favorite match 3 game of all, but lately every level is impossible unless you get JUST the right amount of luck in the gems that fall. I'll give it a few more tried and then I'm uninstalling it.
After 4hrs got to level 6 & couldn't even get close to progressing further. Seemed no point in playing the same level over & over & over again so I quit, you win (but you lost me)

I had rated it 5 stars even though it's tough to pass some levels. It took me more than a year to get to the 18-20th house & then an update sent me back to the beginning. :-( I don't play much anymore.

Relaxing - challenging, love the graphics Update: I was recently out of town and happened to check my bank account thoroughly for something else - I found all kinds of charges I didn't make but came from this game. It came to my attention because I didn't have time to play, not to mention I don't care how long it takes to pass a level so rarely pay for anything to pass a level. LOTS of unauthorized charges - I'm speechless and just sick. Had to cancel my card. I'll NEVER submit a card number for a game again - unless it's a throwaway visa - it would be the only way I would purchase in the future. Its a fun game -  DONT  let them into your account. Just...dont.

... UPDATE ON 3-1-2018 ... Was 5 star now 1. In my best Dalek voice UN--IN--STALL!!! Not sure which update did it, but this game that was one incredible is now slow as molasses! Each move painstakingly takes about 5 seconds for the gems to fall. I'm completely bummed. üòï

Slow and impossible. Yon need to collect items to move forward.  To collect items you need to beat the same previous level over and over. Just completing a level once is a major achievement. Got bored uninstalled

comments: Big fan of Beyblade since I was a kid, from the first generation. So this is cool to play this game and see how far its came. Though there are many glitches in the game, this is the second time I'm gonna have to download because it won't open. Overall, it's a fun game when it's not glitching

Garbage game,is now infinitely looping on a challenge tournament. Once I defeat the first opponent the screen goes black and the game freezes. Reopening the game puts me back in the same match and ends in the same endless loop.   Dev team needs to fired and a patrol of lemurs hired instead because they'd at least be entertaining.

As much as I love Beyblade, this app is really disappointing. The gameplay isn't anything special but the worst is the players. There should be a serious punishment for disconnecting. I cannot enjoy the game - I should have won two matches but I got nothing for them because my opponents disconnected the last second. Truly unsatisfying.

I really like this game but it needs new bey gods and new beyblades my drain fafnir amd satomb is maxed out and i have nothing else to do since the max level 5 but when i played in tounament i vs a level 6 how does that work anyway cooooool game love it
You really don't do anything but press orbs and press to buttons. Plus, just to get cool stuff, you need to go out and buy only beyblade bursts. The game is boring and confusing.
Greatly improved since launch. Achievements are bugged and some Beyblades don't have the correct Bit Beast yet, but most earlier bugs have been fixed. Online play is also a big plus.

descriptionHTML:
BEYBLADE BURST is taking the world by storm! Create, customize and battle your BEYBLADE BURST tops in the BEYBLADE BURST App. Compete to win matches and unlock virtual pieces! BEYBLADE BURST brings the excitement and energy of BEYBLADE to your own personal device!

NEW MULTIPLAYER ONLINE PLAY & BEYMASTER FEATURES!*

•BATTLE FRIENDS: Battle head-to-head against friends online and challenge others worldwide! 
•LEVEL UP TO BEYMASTER: Earn achievements to level up as a Blader —from Rookie to an ultimate BEYMASTER!
•LEADERBOARDS: See who is the top Blader among your friends in the friends leaderboardFRIEND LEADERBOARD
•PERSONALIZED PROFILES: Select a player icon and color from a gallery of options. Choose a continental team badge for battle!
•ENHANCED TOP SELECTION: Redesigned BEYBLADE BURST top selection screen allows you to easily see and filter your collection
•RESTORE PROGRESS: Retrieve lost progress through a restore code

BEYBLADE BURST:
- Battle your BEYBLADE BURST tops in the app with exciting powers
- Customize your BEYBLADE BURST tops in the app with different parts and colors
- Battle and you can unlock virtual pieces for your BEYBLADE BURST tops
- Compete in head-to-head battles online against other players (internet connection required)

USEFUL TIPS:
This app requires access to your device’s camera to scan the code on your BEYBLADE BURST products. Visit your device's privacy settings to enable the camera.

comments: Just constant ads. Every time you go into a menu you haved to watch an ad. After awhile you need gems for every upgrade. P2P gameplay and ads filled. Gameplay is good, but this game seem to only be maded as a cash grab.
They begged me to rate. But i like it, Stop asking me to rate. I Only like GAMES with painting abilities. Okay?
Cute and delightful, the game is well worth some time. It's addictive gameplay is marred by the tap mechanics in so many other games.

The game is alright. What attracted me to this evolution game in particular was how the phoenixes looked. I killed a few hours on this game, and I decided it's not for me. The ads are also way too frequent. I get that you guys have bills to pay, but I literally get an ad each time I go to Mars. There are also a few grammatical errors here and there, as well as an audio error I noticed. When I go to change the colors of my phoenixes and get interrupted by an ad (everytime I might add), the menu music and the main page music overlap each other. This wouldn't be that big of a deal if it didn't happen every single time I opened up that menu. The game itself can get boring after a while as well, so I'd only recommend this game if you have absolutely nothing better to do. Overall, it's an okay game, but it's absolutely swamped with ads and that really kills it for me.
After 2 min in the game my first thought was: wow so nice and simple. No stress.

Compared to other versions of these games i've played, thus one is one of the best. I like the designs better than other versions. Gameplay is the same but that's fine, I don't mind it. Overall good game.
description: How do phoenixes always manage to rise from their own ashes? descriptionHTML:
How do phoenixes always manage to rise from their own ashes? We don’t really know, but now YOU can play a role in their immortal legend!

Combine different mutant phoenix species and create endless new mythical firebirds to promptly replace the ones that perish!

No one will ever notice this smart trick, and the legend of the phoenix will live on forever!

(...or at least as long as you keep playing).

LEGENDARY FEATURES

🔥Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
🔥Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the phoenixes.

HOW TO PLAY

🔥Drag and drop similar phoenixes to create and merge new mysterious creatures to get to the final and powerful god Phoenix
🔥Use phoenix eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
🔥Alternatively, fiercely tap a phoenix to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

🔥Different stages and many phoenix species to discover and merge
🔥A mind-blowing story with mythical twists in a fantasy world!
🔥The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games
🔥Doodle-like illustrations
🔥Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!
🔥No phoenixes were harmed in the making of this game, only developers (but they rose from the ashes, too)

What is it called when a new phoenix is born? A phoenix dawn.

If you like Phoenix Evolution, check our other evolution games. We have Dragon, Cow and even Unicorn Evolution.

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: Ive been really waiting for that perfect ROTK on mobile, I know there are quite a few but this one hits the spot. Thank you very, very much KT and Nexon. I really have no complaints either. The gameplay is just so good and is very similar to classic Fire Emblem. But its so much more than just that. There is so much content, officers to play and build up, items to collect, battles to complete, stories to experience. The various game modes are perfectly executed, and i love it. I really appreciate this game as it is very nostalgic to me as well. Great job KT/Nexon. You've done good. This one is something special.

I rated 5 stars because this game deserves it. Since I downloaded the game, I have been playing it almost non stop. The content is amazing, the welcome package for the release definitely helps new players, campaign story line is well made. By far my favourite tactics game in google play. the only con I saw was the translation of the dialogue is not translated properly and I also some spelling error.  Overall amazing game. I just hope the future updates will not ruin this game. Cheers :)
Amazing so far, I'm a big fan of th koei production games and wish more like this would come out.  Aim for the ps2 rtk's and you got yourself a million dollar deal.  I'd def buy into those games.

Right off the bat, the game is confusing. Work your way through a ways, and things become much clearer. The text that you're supposed to follow for instructions or storyline whips by, but is adjustable in the options. The game is tremendously ad-heavy and the pay to win element is there, but if you can get passed that, it's totally solid.

I have been playing this game for awhile and love it, but today I was logged off and can not log back in now.  Please help, I would love to continue where I am at.  Hope to hear from you guys today, have also emailed you.  Thanks
It's better than the dynasty warriors official game and beats the micromanagement of most kingdom games. Amazing stuff. How a mobile fire emblem should be like.

comments: I paid for the full experience up front. I like the game, but there are some issues the developer need to iron out. For starters, this game Needs To Be Able To Play Offline or without internet access. There should be no reason playing solo Arcade mode requires internet just to play. Also plz fix the reconnection issues with the app not acknowledging when service is restored. I have to force close the app and reopen just for the game to acknowledge that it is able to connect.

Great game, but please add Versus mode and Oni! This is great with the addition of Dan, and on Android now too. But I'm still really hoping that single player Versus mode can be added, like it was on Volt. It just really sucks to be forced to play online basically, and not have a good offline option (only Arcade mode and survival). Also, I would love it if Oni was also added. Thanks for the great game!

I have no idea why this has ANY bad reviews. I'm using the Note 8 and it is perfect on full screen mode. The old school graphics are perfect. It makes Tekken feel like it was made for retarded people. Seriously this game is so good. It's my new favorite game. And 5 bucks to unlock everything is nothing. Perfect reasonable price I'd say.

description: A new warrior has entered the ring! Take control of 32 world warriors and test your mettle against players from around the world. Street Fighter IV: Champion Edition perfects the winning gameplay formula by offering the most exciting fighting game on mobile. Long time Street Fighter fans can jump into the action and have an instant familiarity with the controls. For more casual players Street Fighter IV features numerous settings and tutorials that put you on the path to victory.- Fight as 32 Street Fighter characters including fan favorite and Android exclusive, Dan.- Intuitive virtual pad controls allow players to execute full move sets including Unique Attacks, Special Moves, Focus Attacks, Super Combos and Ultra Combos- Take your game to the next level with a Bluetooth controller (Controllers do not work in menus, they fully function in multiplayer and single-player gameplay.)- Battle head-to-head against players from around the world via Wifi- Single player ‚Äúarcade‚Äù and multiplayer modes.- Unleash super moves with a tap of the ‚ÄúSP‚Äù button.- Four levels of difficulty.
descriptionHTML:
A new warrior has entered the ring!

Take control of 32 world warriors and test your mettle against players from around the world. Street Fighter IV: Champion Edition perfects the winning gameplay formula by offering the most exciting fighting game on mobile. Long time Street Fighter fans can jump into the action and have an instant familiarity with the controls. - Battle head-to-head against players from around the world via Wifi
- Single player “arcade” and multiplayer modes.
- Unleash super moves with a tap of the “SP” button.
- Four levels of difficulty.

description: A brain-training puzzle in which you draw 1 line, that will sharpen your wits.In this free-to-play puzzle game, you merely have to draw one line. It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep.Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun.SummaryA brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play.When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?How to playThere is only one rule:"Connect all the points with just one line."It doesn't matter where you start.There are some fiendishly tricky, complicated puzzles among the large number of stages.When you get stuck, make use of a hint.StagesThere are 10 levels, and a total of 500 stages.At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, and it gets more and more complicated.You might think it's too easy early on.However, clearing the simple stages is also important.The hints to clearing the later, more complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.Some unique types of line, such as "one way lines" and "overlapping lines", can also be found throughout the stages.These special lines will encourage your imagination.Use this chance to activate your mind as you play, by trying to solve this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game.You're sure to get hooked!!
descriptionHTML:
A brain-training puzzle in which you draw 1 line, that will sharpen your wits.
In this free-to-play puzzle game, you merely have to draw one line. It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep.
Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun.

Summary
A brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play.
When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?

How to play
There is only one rule:
"Connect all the points with just one line."
It doesn't matter where you start.

There are some fiendishly tricky, complicated puzzles among the large number of stages.
When you get stuck, make use of a hint.

Stages
There are 10 levels, and a total of 500 stages.
At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, and it gets more and more complicated.
You might think it's too easy early on.
However, clearing the simple stages is also important.
The hints to clearing the later, more complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.

Some unique types of line, such as "one way lines" and "overlapping lines", can also be found throughout the stages.
These special lines will encourage your imagination.

Use this chance to activate your mind as you play, by trying to solve this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game.
You're sure to get hooked!!

comments: I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.
Game is good. Ads are bloody appalling. I have to waste 30 seconds each time I die? No thank you
Alright if you like ads more than gameplay. Stuck with 30 second ads after 20 secs of play. Don't mind some ads, but this is overkill. Pass.

Edit: Ruined it because if the ads. I understand why you have them, but I was willing to watch them IF I felt like doing another round or not. Having the choice to watch one or not was nice. Now you're just forced to after death. Sorry, that's never a good idea. And no, save your copy pasted response, I don't want it. It's not genuine, and it's just a plead for us to buy the ad removal thing.  Original: The core gameplay loop is cool. It's fun, I'll keep booting it up. But it would benefit greatly by a better tutorial. As someone else said before, the ball tends to fly off and lose momentum in ways I can't seem to figure out. Might be a failing on my part, but at times it feels like gravity changes the rules at random and I'm left floating hopelessly as the void swallows me up. I'm not really sure what the optimal way to survive is
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!

The game itself is a lot of fun, it's challenging and addictive but with ads this game is a nightmare, they massively hinder your ability to progress and learn the game which is very frustrating. I made the in app purchase to remove the ads and without them the game is flawless. I think if the ads were reworked to be slightly less regular (i.e. not every time you lose) more people would be able to appreciate the game and might be more inclined to make the in aop purchase to remove them rather than getting annoyed at them before they've had a chance to enjoy the game.

descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! New modern 3 muscle cars.  Bonus!Baseball-bat. Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games   While you're thinking, your friend is already driving!

comments: Very good app that trains logical thinking. If you want to be a computer scientist, math isnt everything since math and logic are different areas. This game gives a pretty good idea of whats behind coding, and its a good supplement to play when you are bored while improving some skills at the same time. The controls could improve, such as being able to reset the bots position, or cancel a loop run without having to reset all the code. Im looking forward for more planets :D

One of the best applications I have encountered till date. Am not into programming, but still had to learn it as a necessary course for a semester. There was no need of it afterwards, so the teachers were simply skimming everything. We were taught from basics to looping in two classes with zero previous knowledge about programming. But still this thing caught my attention. Only if they would have recommended this game to one and all, we would have spent a nice semester. This game pretty much explains the basics, but with better understanding. Great job.

Love this game/app. I mean the only thing I wish it had a little more instruction to learn from (I got function-2 but not the way it should have been done.)  Just as I am "self teaching" with only books and apps. But anyway this app still gets 5 stars.

For User: If u intrested about programing language.Play this helpful game to learn basic , function and loop methods of programing.  For Developer: This is helpful fun game for learning programing game.Keep try. I want to advise you.  First: When U go your Profile,use Intent To Direct Facebook App when Facebook App is Installed. Second: Use Rate This App Function to get more Point on Your App. Third. When I tap RUN button,it cannot stop if loop was entered.So use pause and stop buttons for 2 functions because if i can't stop i tap Retry button and all of code are gone away and stard think again.it's the bad moment for me.  More Easy More Powerful.Thaks.

Difficulty level is all over the place. Doesn't really do well to teach programing concepts and more of just puzzles.   Coding is about finding the most efficient way to do something.   The game actually encourages you to do an infinite loop and run redundant steps to complete a puzzle.   Crashes almost all the time

It's interesting, but my main gripe is that it really doesn't feel like you're learning how to code. There's also a bug where if you press the restart button it erases all your work. So, if your robot is stuck in an endless loop, you can't save your work at all. It's also a bit short at the moment, finished all the levels in under an hour.

comments: This was my favorite game as a kid. Of course I played it on NAMCO museum for PlayStation. The controls were perfect and the entire family loved to compete. This version looks the same graphics wise, but these are the worst controls possible! Too small space and the fire button and move buttons aren't very responsive. I looked for this game before and it wasn't in the store now it is. Want to rate 5 stars but please fix the controls first. Too hard to play and enjoy at the moment.

If the controls were better, this would be 5 stars. This really reminds me of my childhood. I was around 12 years old when this came out. Great retro game that is authentic and gun, except for the controls, they don't respond all the time and the placement is bad.

You should be able to change the on screen controls to your liking, the on screen d-pad has and up and down button that does nothing and it just takes up room on the screen. But this is the closest to the real thing on the whole Play Store and it's still fun.
I absolutely love Galaga. It's (in my opinion) the best arcade game form the 80's. The only thing about this is the controls are sort of hard to use. It's not bad, it could just be tweaked.
It's fun, but the controls are so weird. Like the ship doesn't fire NEARLY as fast as in the arcade games... Fix this please?
My all time favorite as a kid. Was impressed how close it is to the arcade version but the controls are horrible. Please please please do something to improve them.
description: The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
descriptionHTML:
The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.

A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.

Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.

*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
summary: Controls a starfighter to destroy insect-like enemies
title: Galaga

comments: Such a shame. The game is great, really enjoyed the concept however it is a prime example of how monetisation strategy can ruin a game. Gems too difficult to earn without buying them, and purposely easy to accidentally spend them. Too many ads too. I'd rather have paid for the game. Deleted it after a  day or so.

Not What It Used To Be  The second to last update I did for this app switched the aim of the ball to slightly off from where you point it. So now have to compensate (guess a bit) when you're aiming which makes play more challenging.  Likewise, levels beyond about 440 are becoming impossible to beat w/o saving like a weeks with of bonuses to use on each level. Beating one level a week is hardly fun anymore! I may be uninstalling this app soon.
Everything has been great till about 1 month ago when the graph is slowed downed. After you start off there's delays in the line of balls and very unsettling it's not continuous anymore.

Game has so much potential and is a blast. I'm giving it a bad rating because gems are insanely expensive and they have so many buttons to hit to "use 200 gems to remove 3 lines" as one example or another to lose 200 by placing the button right above the back button on a phone. Super lame move on devs to intentionally take insanely expensive gems from us by mistake. No confirmation or anything, just boom, gone. Lacks ethics to say the least rinow
Games fine. I refuse to rate a game well when it's annoying ads start pushing political agenda against gun owners. Will go elsewhere
Great game.   But one of the adverts is a virus.   The IG Academy advert wrecked my game and now my phone's being a pain in the ass

comments: Guys, this is an amazing game! Seriously, only problem the jump button is EXTEMELY unresponsive.. especially on the swimming levels, is this a design choice or a small bug, because on the normal land levels its "ok" still horrible but on the swimming levels its extremely unresponsive and is hard to stay consistant. This is the games biggest flaw. Its EXTREMELY unresponsive

Great game! Quite challenging, and really fun. I have a small bug to report. On level 8 on Classic mode, the air meter is messed up. Multiple times I have spawned and immediately died from drowning. Pretty annoying. Also, when you first enter the spinning spike section (level 8 or 9, I can't remember), the entry field is placed quite high. Sometimes I try to swim under the spikes on lvl 8 and then get warped to the next section and immediately touch the spinning spikes. But other than those two bugs, the game is amazing!

Love this game! I have beaten both new and classic levels and they are awesome. The spinning line of blades that go up and down the screen in Level 8 is especially brutal, and to me several tries to beat. To everyone saying its impossible, its not. Juat keep trying and you will get it. Overall just a fun mobile game.

Great don't know why people are complaining about difficulty, just got to learn the patterns. There is a glitch though that doesn't let you access the third submarine (level 11?) level half the time. Get a game in development screen instead

Is a there a bug when i am trying to go down in submarine spikes that swings level 9 cuz i think i cant go fast enough down wards in the last thing that i needed to dodge where the spikes go up and down then the 3 one is just impossible since i am too slow??  Just me being bad or is it a bug?

Great game i love tge difficulty i alway get out when i die alot but find my self coming back and playing and gettin to new levels. I wish you do more games like it and go to pc and console also with better graphics

descriptionHTML:
Nice and addictive 2048 puzzle game to play with your friends and family.
Make high score and compare your score with people worldwide in leaderboard.

How to play:
Slide same number tiles up-down right-left and merge them to make bigger number. For ex. 2+2=4, 4+4 =8, 8+8=16, 16+16=32,... and so on. As soon as you create 2048 tiles you will win the game.

To access leaderboard you have to login with your google plus account.

comments: I rather enjoy the game a lot. It feels balanced for the most part,  leveling takes a while which wouldn't be a issue if it didn't take so long to go place to place. Gets sort of annoying to go back and forth trying to get resources and the game goes from fun to grindy quickly.   My main issue is the battery life of my phone. While charging my phone and playing this game but battery was being drained.  Graphics are good, I enjoy the crafting and base building, the combat is nice, and the auto harvest feature is a life saver.

**UPDATE** Is an awesome game. Could use a few more perks (ie. Weapons and hard to get items) in drop boxes and yellow zones.Now the down side is if you die in a level your last position is no longer there to try and recoup some of your items. Players killing you as you open trunks in inventory. Oh ya and the free spin box...give random prizes instead of coins and rope. People will get really into it if perks are awesome. Great game could be the best with a couple tweaks. Awesome job.

Just another game that either makes you wait to play it, or pay not to wait. Why? Don't make me pay not to wait. Entice me to pay with cool things, otherwise it's an instant uninstall. Poor business model. Imagine paying double to get them to make your food faster at a restaurant, or just wait a long time. Would you really keep going there, or somewhere else that makes something just as good but in a reasonable amount of time?

Anyway i edit this review... The is nice and graphics are cool. But there is the problem on the game. Could you pls remove the energy bar so i can still play the without waiting to fill the energy bar... Cause otherwise i less play this game in days... that you know you must wait your energy bar to fill again in a couple of minutes if the energy is gone?. Pls Remove it so we can play all day along.. Thank you.

This game truly amazing with beautiful graphics, decent yet easy controls, a large amunt of items and okay customization. The only reason i give this a 4 star rating is because one thing. The hoard mechanic. I mean it's a good concept. The only problem is that there's a hoard every 24 hours. And since wood is kinda pain to get it sucks to come back after work to come to a destroyed house. If it was like every month or heck even every week that would be fine just please give more time than 24 hours for a hoard

Not happy at the moment after the latest updates... No point of spending any cash seeing that you went from getting a loot box to only getting one item at a time... Some parts are still impossible to come by even clearing the infected forest. Hope the next update will be more worthwhile. Apart from that still a good game. Keep it up
description: Last Day on Earth is a FREE MMORPG zombie shooter survival and strategy game, where all survivors are driven by one target: stay alive and survive as long as you can in this post apocalypse game and shoot walking dead zombies. There is no place left for friendship, love and compassion. A deadly plague virus pandemic has turned the world into a dead zone full of unkilled zombies. You can trust only yourself in this post apocalyptic game infected with walking dead zombies. Instructions for survivors: ZOMBIES AND ENEMIES EVERYWHERE!You are alone against other survivors and army of walking dead zombies and other unkilled in this free zombie shooter survival and strategy game. Shoot and gunship zombies and other unkilled to survive in this post apocalypse game or they will kill you.JOIN A CLAN AND GUNSHIP ZOMBIES WITH FRIENDS!Shoot unkilled walking dead zombies with other game survivors - it‚Äôs an effective war strategy for this free zombie shooter rpg strategy game. It is easier to survive in this post apocalypse game and shoot the walking dead together with other survivors. So join clans and gunship zombies as much as you can! KEEP CALM AND CRAFT! SURVIVALCRAFT IS VITAL!Improve your game strategy and survivalcraft skills and create more deadly weapons against the unkilled walking dead zombies and enemies. Choose a target wisely and shoot zombies or pull a dead trigger in wildfowl to get some food. EXPLORE NEW TERRITORIES AND SHOOT ZOMBIES!Search abandoned military bases and survivor‚Äôs camps in order to find and take the most valuable resources and deadly weapons. Keep away from the zombie frontier and gunship zombies to obtain resources.COMMUNICATE WITH OTHER PLAYERS!Use the chat. Information is the second most important resource after life in this post-apocalyptic zombie shooter rpg game. Join clans and gunship zombies or go to raid, clear new territories from the unkilled walking dead and move the zombie frontier. IMPROVE YOUR SURVIVALCRAFT AND STRATEGY SKILLS!Plague infection, wild animals, hunger, thirst and cold can kill you faster than a walking dead army. The world has turned into a residence of evil, where the plague infection rages. In this free post apocalypse mmorpg zombie survival game your own target is to craft more deadly weapons, shoot zombies and try to survive. Survivalcraft is vital for your strategy to survive in this post apocalypse game infected with plague virus and unkilled walking dead zombies. In 2027 an outbreak of an unknown plague virus infection wiped out most of the world‚Äôs population. The raging virus was named deadly plague infection. description: Superbru is a free social fantasy and predictor sports platform. It's a fun, competitive game for casual and fanatical sports fans alike, with prediction and fantasy games in Rugby, Soccer, American Football, Cricket, Golf, Motorsport, Cycling and more. Check the live scores for the latest know results. Challenge your friends and colleagues in private pools - and beat them!We've got three exciting game models for various sporting tournaments throughout the year, our Predictor, Fantasy and Superstars games:Predictor (also referred to as Tipping):Our original game which always proves challenging, no matter how long you‚Äôve been playing. Predict the winners and score margins for every fixture in that tournament. You‚Äôll be rewarded with points for your prediction accuracy according to our tried and tested scoring system, which will rank you against your friends in the pools you compete in and the rest of the SuperBru community. This will keep you watching the match right to the dying seconds as you hope and pray for a last minute score to get the Margin Point in your favor. Fantasy:Select a squad of players and a starting line-up for each round in the tournament and earn fantasy points based on how well your team of players performs in their real life fixtures. Plan your team carefully and make some shrewd transfers each round to capitalize on the next round‚Äôs matches to sneak ahead of your friends. We've got Fantasy games for various major tournaments for both Rugby (Union) and Soccer (Football). Superstars:Our Superstars games are designed to be somewhere between a predictor game and a fantasy game - it only takes a couple of minutes each week to make Superstars picks, there are no transfers to make or team limits to worry about, but it still offers the fun of following players as well as just match results.We‚Äôve recently launched the following games for the 2017 season:Super Rugby Predictor, Fantasy and Superstars gamesFormula 1MotoGPAustralian Football League (AFL)National Rugby League (NRL)Major League Soccer (MLS)The US Open 2017 Golf Superstars Currie Cup Premier DivisionIndian Premier League Cricket T20 (IPL 2017) Predictor and Superstar gamesGiro d'ItaliaTour de FranceVuelta a EspanaNatwest T20 Blast PredictorRugby League State of OriginJunior World Championship RugbyThe Rugby Championship Predictor, Fantasy and SuperstarsCaribbean Premier League T20English Championship FootballScottish Premier League FootballWomen's Rugby World CupPGA Championship Golf SuperstarsEnglish Premier League 2017/18 Predictor, Fantasy and SuperstarsMitre 10 Cup RugbyAviva Premiership RugbyLa LigaBundesligaTest Cricket SuperstarsTop 14 French RugbyTop League Japanese RugbyOther tournaments to be launched soon include:NFL 2017Australian National Rugby ChampionshipA-League SoccerThe US Open TennisWorld Sevens Rugby SeriesPremier Soccer Leagueand many more to come throughout the year.Keep track of live scores with our clever crowd sourced live scoring tool. If you're watching the game, why not join in the live scoring contribution as well to keep your fellow Brus up to date - we'll list you as one of the contributors to acknowledge your efforts during the match. So there you have it - however you want to play SuperBru, we hope there's something for everyone. Good luck for the season ahead!
descriptionHTML:
Superbru is a free social fantasy and predictor sports platform. It's a fun, competitive game for casual and fanatical sports fans alike, with prediction and fantasy games in Rugby, Soccer, American Football, Cricket, Golf, Motorsport, Cycling and more. Check the live scores for the latest know results. Challenge your friends and colleagues in private pools - and beat them!

We've got three exciting game models for various sporting tournaments throughout the year, our Predictor, Fantasy and Superstars games:

Predictor (also referred to as Tipping):
Our original game which always proves challenging, no matter how long you’ve been playing. Predict the winners and score margins for every fixture in that tournament. You’ll be rewarded with points for your prediction accuracy according to our tried and tested scoring system, which will rank you against your friends in the pools you compete in and the rest of the SuperBru community.

This will keep you watching the match right to the dying seconds as you hope and pray for a last minute score to get the Margin Point in your favor.

Fantasy:
Select a squad of players and a starting line-up for each round in the tournament and earn fantasy points based on how well your team of players performs in their real life fixtures. Plan your team carefully and make some shrewd transfers each round to capitalize on the next round’s matches to sneak ahead of your friends.

We've got Fantasy games for various major tournaments for both Rugby (Union) and Soccer (Football).

Superstars:
Our Superstars games are designed to be somewhere between a predictor game and a fantasy game - it only takes a couple of minutes each week to make Superstars picks, there are no transfers to make or team limits to worry about, but it still offers the fun of following players as well as just match results.

We’ve recently launched the following games for the 2017 season:

and many more to come throughout the year.

Keep track of live scores with our clever crowd sourced live scoring tool. If you're watching the game, why not join in the live scoring contribution as well to keep your fellow Brus up to date - we'll list you as one of the contributors to acknowledge your efforts during the match.

So there you have it - however you want to play SuperBru, we hope there's something for everyone. Good luck for the season ahead!

comments: I really love this game, you get rewarded for prioritizing property and it's very satisfying to finish the level with a perfect score when you time everything just right. The diamonds are a little bit too rare to get and since half the updates are priced with diamonds the end result is each location doesn't get 100% upgraded, witch is a little bit frustrating. I love that when you revisit a level it's slightly different, makes it much more interesting. It's a lovely little game, kudos to the developers and designers!

I like this game but it needs to give better options earn Crystal's and it should not cost you as many if any at all to move to next level. I play a lot of games and don't mind spending a few dollars but now I'm turned off from it. Yall need to do better. I Won't suggest it to any of my friends for that reason alone.

Very slow gameplay with little challenge. Tasks end up feeling more like chores, especially the "special" characters that don't shop. You're forced to do each plodding level five times for a chance to earn Gold. Significant upgrades cost diamonds - which you mostly get from reaching Gold, which means a lot of slow grinding. If you're new to the genre it'll probably suit. If you're not, it'll probably be boring.

1. This should have an UNLIMITED LIVES option. The stages per level are unenjoyably difficult enough --why do you have to limit the player's chance to try and be better?? Some levels are impossible for human fingers already.  2. You should lessen the required number of diamonds as value of items to upgrade!!! A player only gets 9 diamonds per level achieved. 10 gems per upgrade is ok, but 50??? FIX THIS ASAP or people will be deleting this app.

I wish the basket didn't run out so quickly, and that she moved a bit quicker. I play a lot of games lime this and that is always my issue I line up my moves and they don't move fast enough. But I really like trying to beat my own score. I wish you would get rewards quicker though, it costs so much to get the gems.

It's a good game but after a few levels it gets boring. Yes it still is fun yo play but it isn't as fun as it was at the beginning. It takes to long for a new person or a new object to renew your game. If you would change that I would be very happy and would play this game a lot more.

Running a grocery chain can be a lot of fun! Dive into this highly addictive time management game based on our bestselling Supermarket Mania franchise – and prepare to stay on your toes every single second. Join millions of players who are already fans of Nikki!

comments: A very fun game that is both simple and a bit challenging because you have to make literal split-second taps to get it to work properly. The only downside is that it's a very short game. There are only two places to colonize and once you've done them and reached level 10 on both, there's really nothing left to do. It would be nice if they added more levels to colonize or some other form of continuation.

Before the update it was quick to grind lots of cash but still it took some time. With my current build, I was reaching 10k+ averaging Greats and Awesomes but now after the update I barely scratch 8K! You guys nerfd the fuccc out the rocket power!!! NEW PLAYERS DON'T EVEN BOTHER WITH THIS! IT WILL TAKE YOU A VERY, VERY, VERY LONG TIME TO GRIND!!!

The game itself is awesome, really awesome. But my god, there is too many ads, It is okay to have ads in a free game, I totally understand, the dev has worked to build a game so it is fair to receive money back for the work.  But here there are too many ads, there is ad in game, there is ad when you lose a match and there are the famous win coins for watching a video.  Couldn't find an option to buy the game and remove the ads, hope the developer improve this, because the is really awesome...

Good game, played it over a long period here and there and I've basically completed it.  Would love to see more planets! And bigger challenges, as currently every time I go on it my little explorers are making over 1.5 million a day and I've got no where to take my space funding! Haha   Great game imo, just needs more features, planets, asteroids maybe. :) Good job.

Very cool and challenging. 20 seconds game that has taken several hours. Graphics are amazing and victory audio also. Needs lot's more planets and more ships, only 2 planets is a shame. Speed and other gages would be nice. A flag in each planet. Ads didn't bother me that much. 5 stars for the team

It's a fun game, just need more planets to jump to and more rocket skins. The colony is just a bunch of people standing on the planet. When I think of colony, I think of buildings and sustaining life and such. Would be nice to see the 'colony' grow bigger each time you rank up. (Example, more buildings etc.) Also, a choice of a button to press when detaching the rocket and different rocket shapes to choose from. Thank you
