description: Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. You can pick matching outfits or completely different clothes for each girl. Even though the bride is the most important person at the wedding, the bridesmaids will also need to shine. Do your best as a wedding stylist!Classy Wedding Salon game features:üíê a gorgeous bride and 3 bridesmaidsüíê makeup, hair and dress up game levelsüíê wedding themed makeup, hairstyles and clothing items (dresses, blouses, skirts and lots of accessories)üíê girly graphics and intuitive gameplayüíê free to play wedding gameüíê fun and safe for little girlsüíê no wifi gameThe wedding will start soon and these lovely girls need you! Join them right away in one of the most amazing wedding games. Do the bride's makeup, style her hair and find the perfect wedding dress. Then, explore different fashion options with the 3 bridesmaids. You will never get bored of this game for girls, give it a chance and let the fun begin!

comments: An easy to learn game but interesting storyline using manga style. As an f2p player, I struggle a lot against other paid player who have a lot SSR character, although its not impossible to gain one, but it required a lot of patience...and luck. So far i still enjoy the game but seriously the energy recovery should be shorter, I can't even farm my character to blue+2 at this speed.

My son loved it till I made a recent transaction for him. Bought the 59.99 diamond pack for my son and he didn't receive all 4000 something diamonds he only received the amount for the 29.99 worth but payment shows for 59.99 would like a reimbursement on the rest of the diamonds or my money back please!

The story is great. The animations are great. The only thing I don't like is the chat system is awful and how little I can edit my announcement board in my faction. In most games that board is where the leader puts his rules and it would be especially useful because of how bad the chat system is few people are using it.

Can u make more playable girl character more striples D: .. just kidding.. but mybe iam really hope its become real haha  By the way.. i love this game.. i never play game in Android.. but yeah.. now I play because law of creation... 5 stars ^^

It's not bad for what it is. Magna style game that puts each picture as a stage. Every page is the chapter as you move on. Biggest flaw is obtaining a new character. Is very hard to get rare characters and most likely going to keep your same old group. Stamina also ruins game play as you need to grind out pages to upgrade your units. Not perfect but at least I had my fun with it.

The energy refill takes ages. 6mins per 1 enegy?? I already recharged and wanted to play game more. But the waiting of energy is hilarious that i have to play the game next day after draining the energy today. I'm uninstalling it now.

description: Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.Of bikers and outlaws ‚Äì the story:Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn‚Äôt have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don‚Äôt see, don‚Äôt listen, don‚Äôt tell. And most importantly, don‚Äôt get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn‚Äôt just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me. Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. descriptionHTML:
Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:

Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.


Of bikers and outlaws – the story:

Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn’t have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don’t see, don’t listen, don’t tell. And most importantly, don’t get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn’t just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me.
Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. My bike always was more to me than just a vehicle. So founding my own motorcycle club and painting the streets red with my fellas ever since felt natural. Together we keep the streets free of those who think can mess with us.


That’s what you ought to do:

Just out of jail and free again but with your own district now that you can manage from underground it is your duty to start your career as a gangster anew and found your own mc club. Your goal must be to expand the Motorcycle Club (MC) and rule the district with the help of your biker friends. Earn money, expand your influence and attack and rob other players in game. But watch out! The cops got their eyes everywhere so always remember to briber them and be sure that they keep their eyes shut and stay out of your business.
With fortunes and tactic you’ll be the king of the road and rule them with merciless severity.

In game Features:

Bloody Roads, California is a strategy and building game, that asks for strategic thinking, fortunes and tactic. These are the features you get in the game and that will keep you entertained and on the edge of your seat for hours.

• Found your very own MC
• Fight against bikers from other players in merciless streetwars
• Get onto your chopper and built up your own empire
• Earn money by running tattoo studios, bars and other establishments, to expand and built up your MC
• Train your bikers to keep your business going.
• Have a blast with this multiplayer strategy game

Sophienblatt 21
24103 Kiel
summary: Get onto your motorbike and found your very own motorcycle club (MC).
title: Bloody Roads, California

description: In this game you have to do different kinds of work.You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them  on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.Download "Chop It" for free!Have a good game!
descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to do different kinds of work.
You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!

You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.

Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.

Download "Chop It" for free!
Have a good game!

description: Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success. ****READY YOUR WEAPONS****They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.**** INTENSE GAME PLAY **** Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select. Features:-Pixel cube graphics-Six levels to conquer -Precision aiming -Radar map-Health meter -Perks & power-ups-Blocky weapon collect
descriptionHTML:
Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success.

****READY YOUR WEAPONS****
They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.

**** INTENSE GAME PLAY ****
Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select.

Features:
-Pixel cube graphics
-Six levels to conquer
-Precision aiming
-Radar map
-Health meter
-Perks & power-ups
-Blocky weapon collect

comments: This game is a game I can proudly say I will never delete. I hadn't played this game for very long but I have loved it so much. The game is incredibly fast paced so you can play up to about 4 games in 10 minutes. It's never boring and always keeps you on your toes. Both sides are fun. (I feel the sniper needs a buff but this is just my opinion). Other than that small compliant  I love this game.

It was very fun testing the early access! And the thing that i noticed was the new token system. Im not saying the token system was bad, but i liked the older system better. On how there were bronze, silver, and gold stars, and the star depended how good the item was. I was wondering why you changed it. –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä—è!

This game has been amazing since early-access. I  have loved it for a long time and will still love it for a long time. One suggestion though. It would be cool if one could emote inside the van once you have got away or have been arrested

Excellent game. Highly replayable. Fun and challenging. My only issue is that emotes switch from one side to the other when playing as a thief vs playing as a sniper. Plus, having to hit a button to fire vs just hitting the right side of the screen is a bit more difficult. Otherwise, almost perfect game.

WARNING: YOU WILL BE HOOKED AS SOON AS YOU START THE GAME. The game is really cool, I love the gadgets, the replayability, variety of maps, and how this could be free to play. Even though there are alot of glitches, these improvements will make up for them

It's really fun, has some great mechanics that aren't very common among mobile games, and it is simple to play. But there is one problem I have, which takes place as theif. Sometimes, as I am about to duck down behind cover, there is a short time frame where the sniper is able to hit you even though you are behind the cover. This is for the full covers, not the breakable or the half. They can also sometimes hit you when you are at the full covers, which I hate. The only time I get mad when I die in this game is when the sniper is able to shoot me while I am in full cover or within that short time frame.

comments: Used to be fun when you could win cherries but now there is absolutely no way to win them. I know most the bingos are fake people getting them because there is no way to bingo after three numbers have been called, but yet 5 people will get bingo after three numbers every round. Such a shame because this could be the best bingo game ever, but i guess this bingo game is all about ripping people off. Wish it would go back the way it was and be fun again. Rainbow bingo adventure has become my new bingo game, it is alot like bingo pop but actually lets you win!!!

BEST FREE GAME EVER!! I have been playing for almost a year now and I love this game. You don't need to put in money unless you want to play for a long time. Each ad you watch gives you cherries to play the game, so its like getting paid to watch them. I am playing now and I just had to stop and share how fun this game is. If you like BINGO, this is the game for you!

It could be one of the best bingo games out there, but its hard to keep up cherries when it barley will give you triple or mega. Also have lost cherries. Ive had at least 100 cherries. Come back a few hours later and they are all gone! And cutting in half the daily cherries I've already worked to get is ridiculous! Going to be uninstalling

I would give you 5 stars except for the last 3 to 4 days it keeps telling me I have new content over & over. It acts like it's updating only to tell me the same thing over & over. I have missed out on getting my daily credits because of this.

This game is so addictive can't stop playing it... Everyone should play Pop Bingo it's so Fun... I love it... The only thing I have to complain about is the cherries don't last you long enough... It's kinda hard to build the cherries up.. I wish Thier was More ways to get Free Cherries.. But other then that I can't stop playing this game ... Thanks so much for making a fun Bingo Game...

When I first started playing over 6 months ago everything was great. It is the best bingo game on Google Play and I have tried every one of them. but the last 78 bingo games I have played, I have not got one Bingo and I barely get any of the numbers it calls. The last 10 numbers it called on one of them, I didn't even get one of the numbers. Is bingo pop broken? I'm tired of spending hundreds of dollars each week on cherries üòí

comments: If you are into interactive games, this is a must play. It doesn't have any romance or even a big friendship to speak of, but it is still a game worth playing. The story is interesting and above all, it is fun. The only minor drawback might be its shortness. Despite that, I can only recommend it :).

It was fun the first time. But not a lot changes between playthroughs and despite killing off ylen they appear at the end of the game like nothing happened. Good but perhaps not worth the 3-4 dollar price tag with how short it turned out to be without the replayability.

[Spoilers] Although this game is a bit short, it does deliver on its promise of an interesting storyline. There a few issues, however. As mentioned, the story is short, and because of this, your fellow Gods don't have much development aside from a few possible quests. There are also some oversights. Killing Ylen at the climax of the battle will still result in her appearing later. Things like that. If this game was expanded to a larger experience, I would happily pay more for that. As it is, it's an entertaining short CYOA.

Well i think its a bit short. Tried all possible routes. Being 100% good and 100% bad but all routes have the same ending. Not worth my money,but hey i already bought it since the first 3 chapters are good. But it was a let down

This was the best game I have ever played, no joke! I feel like it was a little too short though, what if you were to add a free mode? A mode where the story wasn't a thing, but you could play the game without it.

While overall the story was alright, it left a lot to be desired. With the game being so short, I assumed that each path had it's own story for you to explore, however the game is very strict about what you can do.  I honestly do regret purchasing the full game, as imo it falls flat fairly quickly after the first three chapters.  Overall, the idea is great, but in execution it is fairly lackluster.

descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to control the stickman. The goal of the game is to get to the finish line by clinging and jumping horizontal bar. To get to the finish line you will need to overcome many obstacles (saws, axes, walls, fans...). The game has two modes. In the first mode, you consistently go through the levels and gain for each level of reward. The second mode is - free. In it, you can collect coins until will not die or fall.

• Unique game play

The fans of stickman games will be absolutely thrilled!
Play with true ragdoll physics and pass interesting levels!

Stickman flip on the bar is a free game!

description: Best ancient history adventure! Travel in time to the age of pharaohs, when monument building and pyramid exploration were normal! Enjoy creative crafting & building of a desert city, visit the Sphynx, explore the mummy tombs! The whole ancient world waits to be explored!Get right into the exploration of an ancient city of the pyramids! Have a walk in the desert, watch a beautiful sunset! Visit the sphynx statue, go on an adventure around the pyramids, see the best parts of Egypt! Stroll on the banks of the great river Nile.Become a pharaoh and rule your desert kingdom! Walk among your subjects like a god, destroy buildings as you please, build any kind of monuments you want! This is your world and pyramid building is only one of the possible ways of spending your time. Use the creative mode to unleash the power of your imagination to better the world (or to crush it!). Create, destroy, enjoy!Best free crafting game of 2018! Use blueprints to build ancient monuments that will inspire awe. Simply place one and start filling it with blocks to recreate the most famous ancient egyptian structures that you'll certainly remember from history books. This free building game will also let you use your own imagination to create anything you want. Would you like to see a medieval castle in the middle of the desert? Go for it! Do you want to build your own house? Let's do it! Mine and craft materials from sands and stones.Crafting & building a city will allow you to feel like you've actually traveled in time to the age of ancient Egypt. The hot deserts, sandy buildings and people dressed in robes are all presented using unique blocky graphics that may remind you of other adventure games with building and exploration. All of this is your sandbox where you are free to do as you please. Crafting & building will become your second nature.Look no further - one of the top ancient history city building games is here! Download now and become a pharaoh!

comments: Graphics need an improvement, nothing drastic.  Musical score is great, just like the show.   Gameplay is diverse enough to keep you engaged. I would like to see mpre options for alliances in the future. Perhaps a deceptions option list where you can try to steal from other players without fighting. Stuff like that.   Otherwise enjoyable.

This game favors the higher level players or those willing to pay. You'll get top level 5 or 6 and get attacked by someone at least twice your level and lose all your resources. It'll take days for your forces to be healed cause it takes resources to heal them, which were stolen. Anyone you attack won't have much resources for you to steal cause they've either given up on the frame or too low of a level to have anything, so it's a huge waste of time. You can get a shield, but you have to buy what you can't get for free. It's a shame cause it's an okay game.
It's nice to not have packs pop up every time you go to a new area of game! Although, once I bound my account to Facebook,  lagging and crashing started to occur.

Dont waste your money on this game, game has bugs and push notifications doesnt warn you when another player attacks you, when using the ingame bug reports you only get a generic automated email with no follow up to solve the problem. This is not a free to play game. And even if you do spend money, the developers do not tend to problems or even send a mail or refund your money spent.

Game crashed and I lost all progress including $$$ spent. Developers will not reply to my repeated requests to resolve the issue. Many other players have had the exact same problem. I would recommend people stay away from this game

Fun similar to other games I've played, the GOT theme really makes that game fun. It's still relatively new, but bugs are minimal. Some annoyances, nothing game breaking. Game allows you to potentially conquer major cities in GOT, (kings landing, winterfell etc) and control them as a player. Although it's quite difficult. Pretty cool. It needs mor e crafting options, maybe a city wall troop placer, or garrison type option. Also the map is difficult to navigate, more aids wouldbe nice.

descriptionHTML:
Westeros is at war. Great houses clash, dragons rule the sky, and the army of the dead threatens the realm.  Live out your fantasy and join the war.  Build your house and raise your army as you navigate a dangerous political landscape.  Based on the award winning HBO series, Game of Thrones: Conquest allows players to become a Lord in Westeros and define a strategy for conquering the Seven Kingdoms. Winter is here and your enemy’s army will not wait to clash swords.  Wage war and join the battle today to capture the Iron Throne!

A TRUE GAME OF THRONES EXPERIENCE
“In the game of thrones, you win or you die.” - Cersei Lannister

-Become a lord of Westeros: Build your great house, create your sigil, and Fight for the Crown
-Interact with key characters from the hit HBO series including Jon Snow, Daenerys Targaryen, Petyr Baelish, Cersei Lannister and more.
-Capture 120+ iconic Seats of Power like Winterfell, Castle Black, Dragonstone, and King’s Landing
-Navigate the dangerous political landscape using the innovative Allegiance System to live out the fantasy of claiming The Iron Throne and -winning the Great War

THE SEVEN KINGDOMS WILL REMEMBER YOUR NAME
“It’s the family name that lives on. It’s all that lives on.” - Tywin Lannister

-Build your house and claim your territory to rise in political influence
-Raise your army and clash against rival lords to capture iconic Seats of Power
-Defend your strongholds, as each Seat of Power endows you with military and economic upgrades
-Dominate the map, clash with your enemies, and spread your influence

MAKE KINGS RISE AND FALL
“Fight every battle everywhere, always, in your mind. Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend.” - Petyr Baelish

-Master the innovative social system that allows players to recruit bannermen, fight wars alongside your allies, and live out your fantasy of ruling The Seven Kingdoms
-Claim the Iron Throne - In a dynamic political world, choose between deception and loyalty as you shift your allegiances
-Reward those loyal to you with titles like Hand of the King and Master of Coin as you build your Small Council
-Bestow Seats of Power to your allies granting them special military and economic advantages


Only in Game of Thrones: Conquest can you become a lord of Westeros and navigate the dangerous political system as you Fight for the Crown. Interact with key characters and capture  iconic locations from the award winning HBO TV series. Dominate your enemies by using an innovative Allegiance System that allows you to recruit your friends as bannermen as you rise to take The Iron Throne.

LIVE THE FANTASY - PLAY NOW AND FIGHT FOR THE CROWN!

description: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay. The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster- Unique gameplay based on free fall- High performance on any device- Convenient management of the game- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight- Fascinating drop down- Music that complements the gameplay- Realistic graphics- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving- Dynamic mapThis is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.Attention:Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
descriptionHTML:
Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay.

The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.
But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.

Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.

Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas
- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster
- Unique gameplay based on free fall
- High performance on any device
- Convenient management of the game
- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight
- Fascinating drop down
- Music that complements the gameplay
- Realistic graphics
- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving
- Dynamic map

This is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.

Attention:
Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
summary: The best simulator of falling real Gangster!
title: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

comments: It's getting frustrating.. I'm into level 14, have up graded skills and equipment but yet still can't manage to get a bronz let alone a silver or gold in the very first jump in the game. Along with finishing a constant 16th about 95% of the time make me think it's rigged. What's up with that??

Took me a little while to get the hang of the controls but it's fun once you do. Could maybe do with some hints to help get the best body position in flight, as this took me a while to figure out. Otherwise, it's a good time sink.

Sometimes it makes no sense. You are coming from quailication as 7th, you jump to 2nd position so surely you cant finish worse than 8th? WRONG. You end up on 16th place which is impossible. There is no in between you either win or you finish 14th or lower. You have 30 pts lead in front of number 2. after 1st round, you slightly fail your 2nd jump, guess what? 18th place for you! If you jump for example 120m on a K90 in Q, you finish first because everyone jumped 20m less, sudennly in 1st round you need 130m to secure your first place because everone managed to jump extra 30m. All in all fun, but still needs a lot.
No idea how the take off works, seems to be a perfect sweet spot but no tutorials to help you find it. Deleted
Every time I land, I crash. Have tried everything possible, but still always crash.
It's diffrent I've only played 10 min and your asking for a rating. Can't give a fair rating if you don't get time to play lol

descriptionHTML:
Help the rolling ball escape the traps and unlock featured themes.
An addictive thrilling game “Scrolling Ball in Sky” landing on Google Play market now. The future door opens for you from the moment you tap on the screen.
The game features:
● Unique gameplay: help the balls rolling farther and farther away by swiping left or right.
● 3D scene design combined with rock music brings you addictive pleasure.
● Exciting levels: volcano scapes, city scape, desert scape, garden scape and rolling sky scape etc.!
● Fantastic balls: discover all the secrets it holds by rolling balls, or equips in rainbow shop.
● Invite your Facebook friends to challenge your unbeaten record!
Be attention to the roll ball story, you may get a chance to play spin wheel to obtain an unexpected surprise. Do not indulge in the game or you may costs 24 hours in rolling the balls. Very easy to play but very hard to reach the top records!
Scrolling Ball in Sky is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

description: The Amazing Spider-Hero was a regular teenage boy before an alien arachnobeast fused with him and gave him amazing special powers! He became stronger, faster, more agile and has animal-like instincts that can help him detect and avoid dangers. Instructed by his father who is an expert in 42 forms of martial arts, including taekwondo, kickboxing, kung fu, boxing, wresting, muay thai, jiu jitsu, and many more, he made full use of his new-found powers to become a hero of justice and righteousness, donning the mantle of Spider-Hero. But that's not all, the strange Spider-Hero's great intellect also allowed him to develop many useful equipment to combat crime and battle villains. Aided by his mother, the head of a highly advanced research center, the Avenger Institute, he created various versions of his Spider-Suit each more powerful than the last and further enhances his strength, power, spider-sense, and agility. The Spider-Suits also come equipped with highly advanced Web-Spinners which allow the Amazing Spider-Hero to capture or immobilize foes with ease and play with them like a fidget spinner.Even with all that, the Amazing Spider-Hero is still just a teenage boy, he can't be out all the time. So, he must go through a long journey home while defending justice and beating up whatever thugs and monsters that may be in his way before going back to the Avenger Institute.The Amazing Spider-Hero is heading home, but many strange thugs, mutant brutes and strange mutant bulk monsters will try to stop him on the way home. Play as the Amazing Spider-Hero in multi heroic action as he jumps across rooftops, enemies, and helicopters get as far and defeat as many criminals as he can before getting home. Use marvellous spider powers like double-jumps, web-shots, and hyper-dives to fight thugs and jump across buildings! Leap across buildings, jump above enemies and become the best Spider-Hero of 2018 and beyond! Will you be the truly marvellous Amazing Spider-Hero Homecoming?Features:- Amazing 2D Graphics & Animation- Amazing Running Gameplay- Amazing Spider-Suits- Amazing Spider-Powers- Amazing Spider-Hero- Amazing FREE Game of 2018Become the most amazing superhero, defender of justice, warrior of good, and guardian of humanity in 2018 and beyond as Spider-Hero, in Spider-Hero: Homecoming. Play now and prove your heroic worth!As always, check out our other AMAZING games at Gunaga! Thank you for playing.

The doll is dirty! Let’s help! Can you clean the dirty bike? [Happy Clean], makes tidying up fun and exciting!

Follow the creative process to clean the doll and make it better than new! Once that’s finished let’s see what else needs to be cleaned!

There are stinky clothes, dirty bikes, and messy kitchens that need to be cleaned!
Let’s go! Be a happy cleaning hero and save the day!

Each item has its own unique cleaning process!
Playing through [Happy Clean] helps teach kids about how mommy and daddy clean many household items.
Most importantly [Happy Clean] makes cleaning fun and exciting!

Product content:

[Washing clothes]
From dirty clothes to neat wardrobe, kids can have fun washing clothes playing through [Happy Clean] with unique gameplay, cute characters, and realistic clothing!

[Cleaning the bike]
The old bike looks dirty now, but kids can learn about how to reuse and repair old toys by playing through [Happy Clean]’s bike shop.
Make something personal and new! It’s a great chance for your kid to get creative!

[Washing dishes]
There are plenty of things to wash in the kitchen! Kids can practice healthy habits as they learn about how to clean things like a baby bottle, a wok, and other kitchen items! [Happy Clean] makes the routine fun and magical for kids!

Product characteristics:
1. Help your child develop tidy habits!
2. Make cleaning fun!
3. The game is easy to learn, even younger children can play!
About BabyBus
—————
At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through kids' perspective to help them explore the world on their own.

Now BabyBus has offered a wide variety of products, videos and other educational contents for 250 million fans aged 0-8 around the world! We have produced more than 150 children's educational games, 700 children's songs, and animations of various themes spanning the arts, health, and science.

comments: It was fun while it lasted. I was a big fan of the first game and this one was an awesome improvement. Unfortunately my game crashed after months of playing and forced me to play the tutorial again. UPDATE: After reaching out to Pikpok customer service they reset my story progress and gifted me several leveled up weapons that help balance out what I lost. I appreciate their rapid response and look forward to playing more!

3 stars because although the game is fantastic in what it is, it needs optimization for slightly older devices such as my S7 Edge. I had to scale down to 720p screen res to be able to get a good enough framerate. And yes. I already tried playing on low graphics settings (in-game) before i changed my phone's resolution.

After i reach chapter 4, suddenly all my weapons progress are gone,  then i contact the support team,  and they dont restore my previous weapons,  but they give me MORE than what i have before. üòÑ  I really happy with this,  and i really appreciate this.  You guys should try this game. This is AWESOME. Now it's time for me to kill more zombies üòé

I give you guys a 5-star rating. The graphics are amazing. And the weapons are cool. The only thing. I wish we didn't have to have the stamina constraints. And it would be awesome if I was able to keep the extra ammo I find so I have it for future levels. And also its a pain in the ass to level up the guns all the damn time

The idea of the game and the graphics are sweet, solid story line.... But what makes the game blow and not want to play anymore is how you have to level up the guns ( which is impossible to get to where you need to be with the weapons power level wise unless you drop cash.  You shoot a zombie in the head, that should be it....it shouldn't take 5 shots to kill the fucker. Wanna make it tougher? Just add more zombies then. Don't make them impossible to kill. You should also be able to reload when ever you want. At least the first few levels were fun.

OMG. I definitely LOVE this. Better than the first. The storyline had me excited. Now it's more fun running with a goal. Love everything. I'm on the lowest graphic settings but I still encounter minor lags. Oppo A83. But that's fine. I love how you can name your companion. Makes it more personal. Good job!

descriptionHTML:
The sequel to the hit zombie action game Into the Dead (70+ million downloads)!

Journey through the zombie apocalypse in a race to save your family. Arm yourself with an arsenal of powerful weapons and do whatever it takes to survive. Maim, mow down, and massacre the Dead - anything to keep moving! In a world where no one is safe, how far will you go to make it out alive?

FEATURES:
• Evolving story and multiple endings - complete 7 action-packed chapters, 60 stages, and hundreds of challenges
• Powerful weapons and ammo perks - unlock and upgrade melee weapons, firearms, explosives, and more!
• Varied gameplay - fire from military gun emplacements, slay the hordes from atop vehicles, stab them to stay alive, or risk going after them on foot
• Multiple, immersive environments - discover different locations, from oil fields and military bases to campsites and rural farm communities
• Ever-increasing zombie threats - adapt your tactics to annihilate different hordes, including armoured and running zombies!
• Daily and special event modes - prove your skills to win exclusive prizes
• Loyal canine companions - fend off zombies and stay protected in the field

External storage permissions are required to ensure a smooth launch experience for all users

Into the Dead 2 is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

We love to hear from our players! On Twitter? Drop us a line @PikPokGames and join the conversation with #IntoTheDead

Into the Dead 2 requires the following permissions to access game expansion files:

Storage: modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
Storage: read the contents of your USB storage

description: Dancing Line 2018 combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better. Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.Game rules:Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.Game features:1. Original background music2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories3. Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap4. Music is the key to guide you5. Touch reaction, sound sense, and visual reaction is indispensable.6. 3D physical environment and moderate music.7. The line guide your tapping and dancing.Finally all i am going to say is use your Skillful eyes and Finger to guide and Tap the Snake Line through the colorful Maze and enjoy the journey into a Tunnel and Subway Rush full of surprises and remember not to Smash and Hit the walls and to Stack until you reach your temple.Enjoy Sonic Dancing Line 2018 and if there is anything feel free to contact me by e-mail.
descriptionHTML:
Dancing Line 2018 combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better.

Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.

Game rules:
Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.

Game features:
1. Original background music
2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories
3. Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap
4. Music is the key to guide you
5. Touch reaction, sound sense, and visual reaction is indispensable.
6. 3D physical environment and moderate music.
7. The line guide your tapping and dancing.

Finally all i am going to say is use your Skillful eyes and Finger to guide and Tap the Snake Line through the colorful Maze and enjoy the journey into a Tunnel and Subway Rush full of surprises and remember not to Smash and Hit the walls and to Stack until you reach your temple.

Enjoy Sonic Dancing Line 2018 and if there is anything feel free to contact me by e-mail.
summary: The New Game Of Dancing Line Finally On The store and Its Totally.
title: Dancing Line 2018

description: Fasten your seatbelt, start your engine and get ready for some real driving! This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the subburbs, traverse the city streets and show you have what it takes to consider yourself a real driver.A VARIETY OF EXCITING CARSWe have something for everyone. There's a sports car, a pickup, a caravan, even a police van! Every one of them poses a different challenge. Learn to take advantage of their strengths, work around their weaknesses!BELIEVABLE CITY ENVIRONMENTSYou will drive around tracks designed to look as lifelike as possible. City streets are bustling with traffic, the details give the surroundings a real sense of place.REALISTIC TRAFFICStaying on course and avoiding the obstacles won't be your only concern. You also have to mind other cars. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!FREE TO PLAYThe Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases.GAME FEATURES‚ñ∂ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles‚ñ∂ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!‚ñ∂ ARENA: Each track is a challenge full of obstacles and opportunities.‚ñ∂ 100% Free-2-Play Missions‚ñ∂ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel or Tilt Controls‚ñ∂ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view
descriptionHTML:
Fasten your seatbelt, start your engine and get ready for some real driving! This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the subburbs, traverse the city streets and show you have what it takes to consider yourself a real driver.

A VARIETY OF EXCITING CARS

We have something for everyone. There's a sports car, a pickup, a caravan, even a police van! Every one of them poses a different challenge. Learn to take advantage of their strengths, work around their weaknesses!

BELIEVABLE CITY ENVIRONMENTS

You will drive around tracks designed to look as lifelike as possible. City streets are bustling with traffic, the details give the surroundings a real sense of place.

REALISTIC TRAFFIC

Staying on course and avoiding the obstacles won't be your only concern. You also have to mind other cars. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!

FREE TO PLAY

The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases.

GAME FEATURES

▶ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles
▶ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!
▶ ARENA: Each track is a challenge full of obstacles and opportunities.
▶ 100% Free-2-Play Missions
▶ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel or Tilt Controls
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view

comments: Very good game overall, relaxing and good to play if you have a short period of free time. The only thing I would say is I wish opening the piggy bank didn't cost REAL money because I have thousands of golden eggs in it but I can't get them out because I don't want to spend money. Maybe make it that you have to spend TONS of the in-game money to open it. I would rate this 4/5 stars, as I thoroughly enjoy it.

I play the game all the time, but it needs easier and faster prestige. Three days of waiting for the next egg is bs with a prestige score of almost 1,000,000. Also "silos" hardly earn anything. That's my main complaint. Fix it so they earn WAY more over non play or I'm done and I've actually spent money so if you still want that, fix it.

Fun and simple game that lets you gradually grow your farm at your own speed. This is a game you can play from once a week where you collect the money you've collected offline, buy upgrades, then leave the game for another week; to spending a few casual hours of hunting for the drones that give you extra money and gold eggs which are the games micro-transaction currency to buy permanent upgrades that help your farm grow faster. It not so much a race as it is just enjoying your farm steadily grow over time.

Edit: Latest update is thoroughly average. Some great new tools and really cool upgrades mixed in with ridiculously boring time sink achievements. They breathed new life into the game and then stuffed it up and made me sit around for 20 actual real life days for each egg waiting for a chicken counter to reach a billion. Such a shame.  I like big numbers and Egg Inc. delivers in spades. Click and hold functionality, strategic planning and approachable mission targets; one of the best in the genre.

My only complaint is when is that everything you tap opens a menu. So if you were to try to hit a drone and accidentally tap the housing it opens that menu and you can't close it fast enough to still get the drone. I think there should just be a single or couple small menu buttons that allow you to cycle through the different things you can purchase to avoid this. Other than that great game! It's entertaining to have 100 million chickens in your pocket.

The graphic are great and the gameplay is fun but what kept me going was the writing. At first I was like uhhh another newspaper? Those don't do anything... But I kept reading and they are GREAT. On the lower side, the drones often clip in building and can't be clicked or you click straight on it but get sent to a building screen instead and by the time you get back, the fast drones are gone.
description: In the near future, the secrets of the universe will be unlocked in the chicken egg. You have decided to get in on the gold rush and sell as many eggs as you can. Hatch chickens, build hen houses, hire drivers, and commission research to build the most advanced egg farm in the world.An incremental (clicker) game at its core, Egg, Inc. uses many elements from simulation games that give it a unique feel and play style. Instead of menus, you are presented with crisp and colorful 3D graphics and a delightful simulation of a swarm of chickens. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient egg farm.There is something for everyone here:Casual players love Egg Inc's laid back feel and beautiful appearance. Take your time to build a wonderful egg farm and explore all the content.More experienced incremental (clicker) players will love the emergent gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a ginormous egg farm with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.Features- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself- Chicken swarm!- Dozens of research items- Dozens of missions- Many different hen houses and shipping vehicles- A "Nested" Prestige system has the game always feeling new- Wonderful 3d graphics with pixel perfect UI and shadows- Google Play Games Achievements, Leaderboards & Quests!
descriptionHTML:
In the near future, the secrets of the universe will be unlocked in the chicken egg. You have decided to get in on the gold rush and sell as many eggs as you can.

Hatch chickens, build hen houses, hire drivers, and commission research to build the most advanced egg farm in the world.

An incremental (clicker) game at its core, Egg, Inc. uses many elements from simulation games that give it a unique feel and play style. Instead of menus, you are presented with crisp and colorful 3D graphics and a delightful simulation of a swarm of chickens. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient egg farm.

There is something for everyone here:
Casual players love Egg Inc's laid back feel and beautiful appearance. Take your time to build a wonderful egg farm and explore all the content.

More experienced incremental (clicker) players will love the emergent gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a ginormous egg farm with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.

Features
- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself
- Chicken swarm!
- Dozens of research items
- Dozens of missions
- Many different hen houses and shipping vehicles
- A "Nested" Prestige system has the game always feeling new
- Wonderful 3d graphics with pixel perfect UI and shadows
- Google Play Games Achievements, Leaderboards & Quests!

20665 4th St #101
Saratoga, CA 95070
summary: Build an enormous egg farm!
title: Egg, Inc.

descriptionHTML:
SkidStorm is a global multiplayer realtime racing game, free of charge and with simple graphics. You can challenge others online or play alone offline. It offers the smooth control which is really easy to get the hang of! In the game, you may drive the cars and drift though all kinds of tracks, swipe your fingers to experience the thrilling races. You may also fill up nitro tanks to speed up or overtake in the corner to become the champion.

How to play:
- Simply click the button “Left”, “Right” to control where the car goes, and fill up nitro tanks to speed up, and overtake in the corner to win the game.

Feature:
- 24 tracks for you to choose from and enjoy the multiplayer realtime racing to the limit
- 17 different types of cars
- 12 skins to customize your cars as you want
- 5 upgradeable parts: engine, turbo, motor, nitrous and tires
- Form a clan to play with your friends and share the glory
- Leaderboard: win the trophies and get on the top of the chart
- Various game modes: global multiplayer realtime matching mode, single player mode, Career mode, AI mode...
- New content coming soon!

Tips:
- Carefully maintain your drifts to fill up nitro tanks and earn more chances to speed up
- Chicane is the key of how you overtake the others
- Use your nitro wisely: straight paths or the home stretch is the best

The most latest drift racing game made by Cheetah Mobile. Go give it a try!

We’d love to hear your thoughts and suggestions on our game. You are invited to join us to improve it together. More updates and surprises are coming soon. Stay tuned!

comments: The latest update has again reverted my progress while suddenly gifting me some toons I haven't earned. I don't understand what the Devs are trying to do with this, but what a mess
Please include tweety bird on the character. üòçüòçüòçüëçüëçüëç  Bad update though toon task can't be collected. What just happened? The heck, its too hard to level up. The pieces are too huge.

The new update has changed a lot of mechanics and features and it really feels odd from an old player and a Looney Tunes fan standpoint.  For instance, I might understand Porky Pig being moved to WB Studios, because he has had roles before such as a talent caster, but Road Runner?  Wile E. Coyote?  Ralph Wolf?  Really?  Even placing Marvin's house in WBS seems totally odd and questionable, that, ignoring the fact that the Space region is a thing in the universe.  The task mechanic also makes less sense.  One task point even for larger tasks?  And what about the Toons' houses?  They don't even change form after each upgrade and the "bigger loot" incentive still does not apply beyond Level 3.  Also, we kinda know for a fact that the wheels are rigged, but with the current update, you can't really make it more obvious.  I still love the game, but definitely less than before.
Love this game best game in the world and if you do an update make it that you can add six people in your team when you fight other people.

boring after update more pay to play oriented they ask you to get more upgraded toons to progress mission while they reduced numbers of tickets to win in missions plus that restrictions that toons must be from there or there for mission not recommended

After last update the wheel doesnt feel random anymore but programmed to just give the same bronze square. Only hitting the two squares next to the jackpot. Wheel feels rigged now. Didnt had that before update.

description: Description - Super Crash Adventure - WrappedCrash has come a long way, from mascot hopeful to the hardcore platform fan's hero. His latest game may be largely more of the same that much is true.Gameplay - Super Crash Adventure - WrappedWarped is a drop-dead gorgeous game. The textures are impeccable, the animation's top-notch, and the special effects kick some serious booty. It sounds great too (thank heavens for more musical diversity, although I had nothing against Mark Mothersbaugh's score for part two). Play-wise it's the best action-platformer I've played since, well, the last Crash.On the issue of difficulty, Warped does come up one the easy side. It can be beaten by most experienced players in an afternoon. But it'll take days of play to truly complete the game, finding all of the items, and out-doing each stage's best time. Simple as it may seem, the time trial mode really does a lot to increase the game's longevity.So what if the game may not offer the most innovation I've ever seen from a sequel? It still brings enough freshness (in the form of its semi free-roaming portions and new play mechanics) and refinement to the table to suit my tastes just fine. Not only that, it's an incredibly fun game.Feature - Super Crash Adventure - WrappedWarped is very much like Crash Adventure previous two efforts at its core. Crash still runs, jumps, and spins his way though vertically and horizontally-scrolling 3D environments, classic platforming game style. But it also has its share of improvements. Among these are a wider variety of locales (eight in all, from ancient Egypt to the future), a second playable character, and the closest thing to free-roaming environments we're likely to see in a Crash title; a biplane dogfight and Jetski-style ocean outing are just two. All-in-all, there are more than 35 stages.There's also a time trial mode where you can compete against your buddies to see who can get through levels faster, plus unlock a secret warp room is you beat the top time in each. Crash Adventure has also taken strides to ensure that Dual Shock feedback and analog control are both supported in this sequel. You've no doubt played one of Crash's first two adventures, but how does his third stack up? Here's the verdict straight from our resident experts.
descriptionHTML:
Description - Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped
Crash has come a long way, from mascot hopeful to the hardcore platform fan's hero. His latest game may be largely more of the same that much is true.

Gameplay - Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped

Warped is a drop-dead gorgeous game. The textures are impeccable, the animation's top-notch, and the special effects kick some serious booty. It sounds great too (thank heavens for more musical diversity, although I had nothing against Mark Mothersbaugh's score for part two). Play-wise it's the best action-platformer I've played since, well, the last Crash.

On the issue of difficulty, Warped does come up one the easy side. It can be beaten by most experienced players in an afternoon. But it'll take days of play to truly complete the game, finding all of the items, and out-doing each stage's best time. Simple as it may seem, the time trial mode really does a lot to increase the game's longevity.

So what if the game may not offer the most innovation I've ever seen from a sequel? It still brings enough freshness (in the form of its semi free-roaming portions and new play mechanics) and refinement to the table to suit my tastes just fine. Not only that, it's an incredibly fun game.

Feature - Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped

Warped is very much like Crash Adventure previous two efforts at its core. Crash still runs, jumps, and spins his way though vertically and horizontally-scrolling 3D environments, classic platforming game style. But it also has its share of improvements. Among these are a wider variety of locales (eight in all, from ancient Egypt to the future), a second playable character, and the closest thing to free-roaming environments we're likely to see in a Crash title; a biplane dogfight and Jetski-style ocean outing are just two. All-in-all, there are more than 35 stages.

There's also a time trial mode where you can compete against your buddies to see who can get through levels faster, plus unlock a secret warp room is you beat the top time in each. Crash Adventure has also taken strides to ensure that Dual Shock feedback and analog control are both supported in this sequel. You've no doubt played one of Crash's first two adventures, but how does his third stack up? Here's the verdict straight from our resident experts.
summary: Crash has come a long way, from mascot hopeful to the hardcore platform fan's
title: Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

comments: This game could use better and easier ways to earn money for opening the chests and scoring or pay outs after each prize or game. So you can get better equipment and achievements. Would help keep players more interested. My only dislikes so far. I most definitely enjoy the game and think it's pretty awesome!

Best game period. Not just golf or sports game, but any game. Wouldn't change a thing. All ya all who say, oh they need to change this or that, and why do I have to play someone who's better than me? Well it's because you suck, and you have no hand eye coordination. Just shut up and dribb, uh I mean play. #1 game for a reason peeps. Love ya. Dueces. Peace biatches.

Game is based on luck. Could be so much better if it was more realistic ie club selection. How can it be fair when it is easier to chip in from off the green than it is to hole a putt? NEED TO FIX BUG THAT MAKES MY SHOT HAPPEN WITHOUT MY FINGER LEAVING TABLET SCREEN!!! HAS COST ME HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF COINS!!! When are you going to fix this issue??? If this was my game I would be extremely embarrassed with all the fault's

Stop changing the winf its getting boring now !!  I mastered the wind only for ypu to make it not work in in some games or even make the wind twice as strong as the value stated. You should be matched on games played not trophies. Otherwise the good players who go up the trophies quickly always play people with better clubs. The game goes easy on you if you're not good at it which defeats the point of getting good

This game is really starting to piss me off.  Main issue I'm having is the stupid game freezing and telling me it's trying to reconnect in the middle of a game.  I'll make a shot then it will continue to count me down and tell me I'm out of time.  Freezes until my times up. I've lost close to 200k in coins lately and it's really starting to piss me off. Also, never consistent. I'll make a near identical shot as my opponent and ball travels completely different. Really starting to piss me off. Been playing this game for a LONG time and I'm about ready to delete it!

It's cool but everyone seems to be fairly good so all matches come down to a shoot out. Meh. And in the shootouts your opponent can see ur shot if u go first. Meh. All kinds of perks for FB. I don't have FB. Meh. Have to spend $$ to get decent clubs and balls or play this 24/7 and I won't do either lol. Nice try tho playdemic. Cheers.

comments: This game is actually really good, one of the best gacha games out there at the moment. I'm giving one star for now because it's currently unplayable for me. When I try to open the app, I get a black screen for half a second, then I'm booted back to home screen.

One piece story plus the game itself makes it really fun. One problem: for some reason when I'm trying to buy gems, the game doesn't properly update on how much balance I actually have on google play, therefore preventing me from purchasing it when I actually do have enough money.... Please fix.

It's a great game in all manner but the inventoy system needs a complete change. Putting items and characters in the same inventory makes no sense and makes it impossible to store important itmes. Please make a separate inventory for items and manuals and it will be perfect.

Great things have been implemented into the game recently and it must be commended. The thing that really bothers me is the character recruitment side of things, pull rates are really confusing and stacked very heavily in bandais favour. In other words The characters most sought after will have a 0.002% chance of dropping, added to  that the prices charged for a chance of getting these characters is ridiculous, so expensive.

It's awesome but could you put the time of the game somewhere in the corner to see?  I lost 50 gems for nothing cuz I didn't know the exact time.. As some might find it annoying then maybe optional if it's possible

Reached my 400th day today and am still unsure whether to continue or not- 3rd anniversary was a big rip off. For sth which suppose to be a celebration event it did only one thing to consider to quit this game for good.

comments: Awesome Game!! Really I like this game. I dont even have words to describe it. Totally Fantastic... Whatever you say, this is totally cool. But I have a request...please add a column of legendary bikes. Like there is Common, Rares, Epics, and Specials , there should be a column of legendary. Waiting eagerly for the next update. Thanks a lot of making this fabulous game. And I would also like to appreciate the colours and graphics of this game. Thanks to the team for making this game. I advice this game to those who are looking for cool new games. Please install it and have FUN!!!! Dont just look at the pics, install and you'll be amazed.

Unless you have 16 hrs a day to put into this game to learn the track you will never have a very high score. Sometimes your vehicle doesnt respond the same as other runs also you may land on your tail and survive and the next time you die its up and down with the control if you keep going or die. And sometimes it tries to flip when you try to take off resulting in a quick death

Would and will give 5 star. But would like to see a gem counter. It gets rather tough keeping count.  Also I noticed sometimes that when come across the areas that have the 4-5 flat spiked walls that you have to time just right. When I die and revive they all seem to sync up together making it impossible to go under. I'll try and screenshot it next time. All in all great job and awesome game. Maybe a custom map feature for future. Possibly added to the no ads fee. Would be worth it then.

This game is my favorite game ever. The graphics are amazing, the controls are great. I can't seem to find anything wrong with this game. Me and my brother love playing it. I also like that it is available on Google Play Store and the Appstore on iPhones. My old phone was an iPhone, and when I got my new phone I was worried that I wouldn't be able to play it, but thanks to Ketchapp and Google Play Store, I can still play it!! Also, I would like to suggest that you add a feature that allows you to create your own level, but it's not something you have to add, it's just something I think would make the game absolutely perfect for me. Then again, you may already have that feature and I haven't seen it/gotten to it yet. Anyway, it's an amazing game, and I hope Ketchapp keeps making amazing games like this!!! (BTW, Ketchapp games are my absolute FAV.) Thank you!! üöòüòäüöò

This game would be great if it wasn't so laggy. Usually I would think it was an issue with phone storage or something, but I am on a new phone (note 8) and have only added a few apps in total. The game was smooth the first day or two but now the speed changes throughout play. The levels become impossible because the clock doesn't slow down even though the movement of the bike does.   Great concept and design. Hopefully that can be figured out if it is an issue on their side.

The game is great fun. I have been playing it for a few months and actually still play it. The only problem i seem to have with it. Is the laggish performance when i am connected to internet. The moment the internet is off then game runs more smoothly other than that. Still enjoy playing it. Though I must say it would be nice if there was a gem counter for each ride so i know how many I have collected. Otherwise great game

comments: The game is alright. Still too early to give it a proper review. Only here to say that the timers are way too long in the early stages of the game. Waiting an hour or four for thirty seconds of gameplay. They need to work on scaling the progression timers. A game like this is okay with long timers in late game when you have more than one thing to keep track of. But for these pay to win games to be profitable it helps to bait the hook a little harder before making you wait hours for more content.

This game is a solid mix of "clash of clans" and "fallout shelter". Just like COC, you have to learn to let the timers cool off. The long term time investment can be very rewarding. The questing/pvp is also well done considering you can't choose what to attack or when during battle. Wholeheartedly a good game.

GG easy. everyone whining being pay to play this that. i never bought anything and I'm loving this, just need a little patience and you can do many things untill one thing gets done or upgraded. I'm high in ranks, have a clan dedicated to non buyers. its all cool. been over 4 months and i still play this its amazing! great work guys, keep it up and keep adding new stuff.

I love the game.  The thing is, this game just gets boring.  For example,  all you can do right now is to vanquish invasions. That's basically it. The portal is not always open.  The tournament? Well the match ups are way too oblivious.  My in game friends already have started quitting coz of these problems. You have to add something fun soon. Well it is still a fun game tho.

Would be a great game if it wasn't blatantly pay to win.  Everything in the game is designed to push you to pay.  I enjoyed it at first and usually toss about $15 since it was decent.   But then, the system pairs you with opponents you can't defeat which then hampers your progress greatly which then means you either pay or hope you don't get attacked too much and lose all your resources.

Been playing since early access relese. Game is very well built. But like all other games. The ads now bugged. The daily quest for the ad has never worked for me. Starts ad restarts app no credit. Oh well its an ad right. Well now your forcing me to watch them. Please fix So can i atleast finish those 2 daily quest?!?!?!  Also since update my androids menu buttons overlay all buttons on far right/left hand of screen depending on tilt. Phone is an LG stylo 3. Please address and i will rerate later.
description: Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they‚Äôll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies‚Äô castles! All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who‚Äôll soon grow up and serve you too! Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: - Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy ‚Äì the end justifies the means! - Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You‚Äôve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! - Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes‚Ä¶ and then swap them with each other! - Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don‚Äôt like‚Ä¶ And you don‚Äôt like all of them, right?We are now working on:- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!- Collections and unique heroes- Daily log-in bonuses- The improvement of the visual elements of the game- The optimization and balance of the game process- Performance improvementsAll of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
descriptionHTML:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress!

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles!

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too!


Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game:

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means!
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now!
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other!
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?

We are now working on:
- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.
- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!
- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!
- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!
- Collections and unique heroes
- Daily log-in bonuses
- The improvement of the visual elements of the game
- The optimization and balance of the game process
- Performance improvements
All of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
