For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. üëåüëç‚ù§

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

It's a chilled game to play. There are a bit too many ads. And it because it is just tapping, it can be a bit boring after a while. It takes long before you get somewhere new. But all by all it's a free easy game to kill time perfectly.

Only game that has not begged for money and really is fun to play if you can keep up with all the fares driver's n cabs. Just try it yourself. It can be addicting if you don't take your eyes from it haha

comments: I'm totally addicted to this game! great graphics and lots of fun games that really make you think.  I just wish that it used up lives rather than credits because the credits can run out so fast and take a while to build the pot up again unless you want to pay ¬£

It's a really fun and addictive game with one major flaw. After you start getting to the harder levels, you might as well quit and find a new game unless you only want to play one or two rounds an hour or pay to play. Every level costs coins to play and if you fail a level you are out pretty much your whole hourly allotment of coins. Winning a round doesn't make up for even one loss either. Love the game,  but really annoyed that I can't actually play it consistently enough to truly enjoy it.
Like it but costs too much to play. Can only play a short time before I run out of points. To bad because great graphics.

The only thing I do not like about Grand Harvest Solitaire is not being able to earn more coins to play longer. Games cost 2000 coins to play and you don't win much more than 2000 so you're always relying on harvests for coin & unable to play until you build your coins back up by harvesting every hour...
I'm addicted to this game!   You must think about your moves although you are not in total control.  Love the Harvesting of $$$ too.
I am totally addicted with this game. I used to play other games daily but not any more. I just want to play this game.

comments: This is a great game with good ideas. Don't listen to those people who say it's bad as its not. There are some flaws, mainly in the fact that there are only a few maps so more maps would be nice. Also, it would be nice if you could change the name or if there is a way, tell me. There are other slightly bad things but overall a great game.

Great concept the only thing wrong with it is the slow movement's that happens some Times during the game hope  that you all fix it. Another thing is the lack of stages there are only four to three stages and all of them are with ice add more and I guarantee your that your ratings is going to rise. Finally the option to change your name at the main screen and better control's than just jumping. Would love to play it once these issues are fixed and I don't mean to be harsh hope you all got my opinions

This game is good awful DO NOT INSTALL. The graphics are the only decent thing in this game and they are ripped off of the real game. The controls rarely work. The ads are always in the way. The AI's are OP and there is no point in playing the game. Its a much better idea to just buy the real game on steam instead. 100x better

The graphics are perfect for the style, but attacks should be more under your contract with weapons, and variation without. I also can't find the Bluetooth multiplayer hinted by the Bluetooth connection permissions. Is that a later feature? If so please add soon!
I don't like how the only way you can kill people is with guns but other than that it's ok

comments: Is it just me or does this happen to everyone? When I use a power up like 2X or instant bingo, does it land on the same number? I had an "instant bingo" land on B9 on three different cards (B9 was never called)! Same with most power ups! Just curious!!!

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

Okay, I play these games when I wake up and this one costs a fortune to play!!! Then, I have found with the challenges it doesnt give you credit as it should for utilizing the power ups you bought. I just used two for a challenge, and it never registered. If youre willing to dump money this is the ideal game  Oh and you cant reach support through the app to discuss these mistakes so....youre SOL when the game messes up. After spending oodles on this game, time to delete.

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for a Lewis Carroll inspired hidden object game that takes you to a mystical Victorian-era London known as Albion, fraught with intrigue, crime, and danger. Just like Alice in her quest of Wonderland, you’ll have to solve challenging puzzles and encounter unexplained mysteries. Experience the game's unique story by tackling countless quests in your mission to foil the evil schemes of the Queen of Hearts. Download Alice in the Mirrors of Albion and begin your adventure in this truly extraordinary magical world right now!

***KEY FEATURES***
✔ UNCOVER HIDDEN OBJECTS
Track down all sorts of items in several exciting game modes and explore tons of places, from the dangerous outskirts of Albion to elegant Victorian-era studies and cozy confectioneries.
✔ MEET INTRIGUING CHARACTERS
Get carried away by the magical world behind the mirror, full of heroes you’ve known since childhood as well as unique new characters, all of whom have something to hide.
✔ REVEAL INTRIGUES AND FIGHT CRIME
Engage in exciting battles with Albion crime lords and prove that you are the one who can bring order the city and learn all its secrets.
✔ IMMERSE YOURSELF IN THE MYSTERIOUS DETECTIVE STORY
Go on a quest through Foggy Albion, a city full of thieves, puzzles, and wonder. Discover things no one else has seen!
✔ EXPLORE NEW PLACES EVERY DAY
Earn experience points to gain access to incredible new places and buildings! If you’re hungry for more, you can always purchase keys to new locations and other items within the game for real money.
✔ THIS GAME WORKS IN OFFLINE MODE WITHOUT INTERNET — enjoy it on a plane, on the subway, on the road!

description: Quick, simple and easy, Yahtzee is an fun game that will challenge you plenty, and encourage you to try just one more game.Roll it to the limit for the ultimate win with the Yahtzee Classic game. Now with a casino- cool dice, you're ready to roll!Yahtzee is a dice game, which was first marketed as "Yatzie" in the early 1940s. Yatzie was included in a game set called "LUCK - 15 Grand Dice Games".Dice games, by their very nature, tend to rely much more on luck than skill. But playing the odds and calculating probabilities are definitely skills that can help you win the game Yatzy. The objective of the game is to score high points by rolling five dice to make certain combinations. Yahtzee is played with five dice. The dice can be rolled up to three times in a turn to try to make one of the thirteen possible scoring combinations. A game consists of thirteen rounds during which the player chooses which scoring combination is to be used in that round. Once a combination has been used in the game, it cannot be used again.Do the best dice combination in the this multiplayer Yahtzee game. Half of the fun of this game is to yell out the game's name if and when you roll one. A Yatzy occurs when a player rolls and all five dice are the same number. Special Yahtzee rule is, the first time you get a Yahtzee in a game it is worth 50 points (if you use it in the yahtzee slot). If you roll another Yahtzy after you have already got the 50 points (i.e., you didn‚Äôt take a zero), you will get a 100 point bonus.The Yahtzee scorecard contains 13 scoring boxes divided between two sections: 1) Upper section 2) Lower sectionNow play with your Facebook friends and with millions of Yahtzy players around the world.You can also create Private Rooms and invite your friends to play.Unique combination of luck and strategy makes every game of yahtzee an exciting challenge.Dice games are not only simple, but actually a lot of fun, regardless of whether you‚Äôre a child or an adult.If you're looking for some quick, light fun then yahtzee is the game for you.Download it for free today and have hours of fun. ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ Yahtzee Features‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚úî Fast-paced, competitive and fun - for free!‚úî Play with Facebook Friends or as Guest ‚úî Create Private Room and Invite Friends and Family‚úî Play with players across the worldAny suggestions? We always love to hear from you for making this game better. Enjoy playing Yahtzee!!Please don't forget to Rate and Review Yahtzee, we aim to make it one of the best board games out there
descriptionHTML:
Quick, simple and easy, Yahtzee is an fun game that will challenge you plenty, and encourage you to try just one more game.

Roll it to the limit for the ultimate win with the Yahtzee Classic game. Now with a casino- cool dice, you're ready to roll!

Yahtzee is a dice game, which was first marketed as "Yatzie" in the early 1940s.

Yatzie was included in a game set called "LUCK - 15 Grand Dice Games".

Dice games, by their very nature, tend to rely much more on luck than skill. But playing the odds and calculating probabilities are definitely skills that can help you win the game Yatzy.

The objective of the game is to score high points by rolling five dice to make certain combinations.

Yahtzee is played with five dice. The dice can be rolled up to three times in a turn to try to make one of the thirteen possible scoring combinations. A game consists of thirteen rounds during which the player chooses which scoring combination is to be used in that round. Once a combination has been used in the game, it cannot be used again.

Do the best dice combination in the this multiplayer Yahtzee game. Half of the fun of this game is to yell out the game's name if and when you roll one. A Yatzy occurs when a player rolls and all five dice are the same number.

Special Yahtzee rule is, the first time you get a Yahtzee in a game it is worth 50 points (if you use it in the yahtzee slot). If you roll another Yahtzy after you have already got the 50 points (i.e., you didn’t take a zero), you will get a 100 point bonus.

The Yahtzee scorecard contains 13 scoring boxes divided between two sections:
1) Upper section
2) Lower section

Now play with your Facebook friends and with millions of Yahtzy players around the world.

You can also create Private Rooms and invite your friends to play.

Unique combination of luck and strategy makes every game of yahtzee an exciting challenge.

Dice games are not only simple, but actually a lot of fun, regardless of whether you’re a child or an adult.

If you're looking for some quick, light fun then yahtzee is the game for you.

Download it for free today and have hours of fun.

 ◆◆◆◆ Yahtzee Features◆◆◆◆

✔ Fast-paced, competitive and fun - for free!
✔ Play with Facebook Friends or as Guest
✔ Create Private Room and Invite Friends and Family
✔ Play with players across the world

Any suggestions? We always love to hear from you for making this game better.

Enjoy playing Yahtzee!!

Please don't forget to Rate and Review Yahtzee, we aim to make it one of the best board games out there
summary: Quick, simple and easy, Yahtzee is an fun game to play with friends and family!
title: Yahtzee Dice Game

Soul Knight is a multiplayer dungeon crawler where you and your friends use awesome weapons to royally plow your foes. It's awesome. If you're looking for a way to kill time, my government class feels like it's only a few minutes long with this game. And thanks to wifi direct, I can play with my friend across the room from me. descriptionHTML:
“In a time of gun and sword, the magical stone that maintains the balance of the world is stolen by high-tech aliens. The world is hanging on a thin thread. It all depends on you retrieving the magical stone…”

We honestly can’t keep making it all up. Let’s just shoot some alien minions!

This is the game you have always wanted in your subconscious. Explore the dungeon, collect crazy weapons, dodge bullets and shoot‘em all up! Extremely easy and intuitive control; super smooth and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like elements. Best shooter game you will find on the mobile store so far.

Features:
* Unique heroes, with unique ability.
* 170+ weapons waiting for you to explore.
* Randomly generated dungeon world, new experience every time.
* NPCs that actually matter! They will fight by your side!
* Auto-aim mechanism for super intuitive control.
* Many more features that you will find out in game.

comments: My partner is awesome and it doesn't out Trump you or play like a suicide bomber either. Tried the rest but this is the best for free guys. Awesome job. Asthetics is good and simple. Be great if you could put a 'speed slider' dial to slow gameplay down, so as my young master can play whilst learning. Superb guys n gals. This one is definitely worth trying. Beats Zelda's 'free game' she, wants to Trump you out most times.

Love this game! I've read lots of reviews and they kind of surprised me. This game seems to me to pretty accurately reflect Euchre when we play at home. Good hands, bad hands, balances out pretty evenly in the end. We don't use the "Going Under" feature, but it would sure be a help if you are stuck with at least 3 9s&10s to be able to switch with the pile!‚úî The gold circle with the D in it indicates the dealer. The Trump suit is put beside the player who called Trump. Fast, easy, fun!

Bots call Trump when they can't even take 2 tricks, so I'm constantly getting set or setting the other team. It's nice for practice to get use to thinking out probabilities, but that all goes out the window when a bot leads out with the 10 of trump on the first play. Bot logic needs a lot of help to make it realistic.

This game was and is great. I am not a big fan of the constant 5 second ads now though. I understand it is a free app that needs to be supported by ads but it is after every round now  I and I am losing interest because it takes too long to  I play now. I hope you get it sorted out though. Whenever my right calls Bauer and I lead with an offsuit Ace,they NEVER ever have that suit. If I am making it,that same Opponent to my right ALWAYS has an offsuit ace as the stopper . Becoming too predictable in that way. Also,I have never played euchre in real life where you order up your partner and they play too.

Nice Very cool.  Am using it to teach my teenage children the game :)  on the downside - it's not often I'm dealt a decent hand.  N sometimes my partner stuffs up big time (like what were they thinking) :) but then again so do I lol.

The A-I makes it impossible to win unless you play on easy mode. Table talk is an understatement...the cpu gets at least 5 viable loaner hands every game on medium or above and the partners always have just the right cards available. Not random at all and no skill required. Let the players play and don't load the cpu's hand every hand. Ugh
description: Euchre is a classic trick taking card game, similar to Hearts and Spades. It's widely played in the United States, where it's also known as Bacon, and in other English speaking countries. In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game you play with 3 other players, forming 2 teams, and the deck in play consists of the 9, 10, J, Q, K and A cards. There is always a trump and your objective is to score 10 or more points. You get these points in matches with 5 tricks, where the team that scores the most points and tricks wins.In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game, you play just like in real life, choosing between accepting the trump, passing or changing your cards, playing the match with your partner or going alone. Play the best cards and use the trumps wisely to win the tricks.Features:- 3 difficulty levels: choose between easy, medium and hard.- Customize the cards from the deck and the table.- Autosave: restart the game from where you stopped.- Statistics with your performance in the game.- 100% free game, with unlimited matches.If you like card games like Hearts, Spades, 500 and other trick taking card games, you will love Euchre!Download Euchre Free: Classic Card Game now and get ready for hours of fun with this classic card game. And don‚Äôt get euchred!
descriptionHTML:
Euchre is a classic trick taking card game, similar to Hearts and Spades. It's widely played in the United States, where it's also known as Bacon, and in other English speaking countries. In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game you play with 3 other players, forming 2 teams, and the deck in play consists of the 9, 10, J, Q, K and A cards. There is always a trump and your objective is to score 10 or more points. You get these points in matches with 5 tricks, where the team that scores the most points and tricks wins.

In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game, you play just like in real life, choosing between accepting the trump, passing or changing your cards, playing the match with your partner or going alone. Play the best cards and use the trumps wisely to win the tricks.

Features:

- 3 difficulty levels: choose between easy, medium and hard.
- Customize the cards from the deck and the table.
- Autosave: restart the game from where you stopped.
- Statistics with your performance in the game.
- 100% free game, with unlimited matches.

If you like card games like Hearts, Spades, 500 and other trick taking card games, you will love Euchre!

Download Euchre Free: Classic Card Game now and get ready for hours of fun with this classic card game. And don’t get euchred!

Lighting Hero is the savior of the city you will also need to escape him as well. Lighting Hero is Super-fast that time seems to stop. comments: In love with it every second I used it. Have been missing it on my Coolpad Note 3 due to certain glitches with my copy of Warriors Orochi & Orochi 2. The MALI-T720 really sucks. But loving it again on my Lenovo Z2 Plus with Snapdragon 820 and Vulkan. Love the fast forward key, it makes me go LOL sometimes in games. Soon going to buy the Gold Version now as I have a better compatible device. Thank you dev for such a pleasurable claasic experience. Love ya. üòÉ

After the recent update, the app is crashing quite frequently. Hopefully this will be fixed soon. But Vulcan support is appreciated, it seriously improves frame rate and audio, plus the texture looks nicer too. It's a blessing I can play persona 3 on my phone. Haven't tried many other games though. Will edit and update the score once the game crashes are improved. Lastly, thank you to the developer for this amazing emulator.

This has continued to be an amazing app! The ability to run most PSP games flawlessly on my phone is incredible. My PSP broke a while back and I haven't had the money to buy the system again. I had missed playing my favorite PSP games. Now I still can! I highly recommend this app! I also recommend trying Dead Head Fred on it! Fantastic PSP title!

I use a Samsung Galaxy Note 8 (yes the best-of-the-best). And as soon as I selected Vulkan, instead of OpenGL all my games like Midnight Club 3, Midnight Club LA and even Gran Turismo works SUPER FAST AND ON AMAZING 5x PSP resolution. The only thing disappointing is that the emulator doesn't work full screen. *PLEASE ADD FULL SCREEN SUPPORT FOR SAMSUNG GALAXY NOTE 8*. BEST PSP EMULATOR.

Its a fantastic emulator and the best .. using it since 3 years..!! Gameplay is Great.. Graphics could be improved.. Sound is Glitchy (metal gear solid - peace walker).. fix it soon...!! ‚ù§Ô∏è You PPSSPP..!!  *Cheats- I'm unable to use it.. (Make it happen soon.. probably the next update üòá) Best app on Playstore for me..!!üòçüòçüòç Make enhancements for HiKirin Socs.. Creators  of  PPSSPP .. please make an emulator for ps2 also (it's my wish)

Came here to boast about being one of the lucky guys that can use Vulcan plugin üòÅ Tekken six running smooth af on redme note 4. One star less is because games sometimes crash when I turn off my screen. My favourite settings like load latest save state and multi thread processing is missing for some reason.
description: Play PSP games on your Android device, at high definition with extra features!PPSSPP is the original and best PSP emulator for Android. It runs a lot of games, but depending on the power of your device all may not run at full speed. No games are included with this download. Use your own real PSP games and turn them into .ISO or .CSO files, or simply play free homebrew games, which are available online. Put those in /PSP/GAME on your SD card / USB storage.This is the free version. If you want to support future development, please download PPSSPP Gold instead.See http://www.ppsspp.org for more information, and see the forums for game compatibility information.

description: 6 girl friends have graduated from high school and enrolled at college /university. Don't be decieved by their geeky glasses and brackets: these intelligent girls are still fashionistas in their hearts! These young smart women now officially preparing for their future career in business, social or STEM fields. At the same time, they are having the greatest time in thier lives! No pesky parents around, lots of new friends, first love, romance, crazy parties, and some cash to upgrade their wardrobes! They're lucky to have some rich parents who bought an apartment as present for their 18th birthday, and one of them even inherited a mid-size hotel business, so nothing stands in the way of their happiness and enjoyment of life!Pick one of 6 cute dolls of different races and assemble an outfit for each doll in different styles: informal, formal, business casual, geek-style, fancy, classy or other. comments: I love the game.  I played with it for 5 days in a row to get Augustin but now i can't pass 71% loading time without crashing.  I noticed when i changed the server from Tender Loving Hall to other servers it works ok again but sadly all gains are lost.  I wish there's a way to retrieve my character.

I must admit this is the first LGBT game I've ever played and it's quite entertaining. The male sprites are very manly and attractive. The art illustrations from the bar are really gorgeous, wish there were ways to collect them in a gallery. I love the way we can customize our main character's cosmetics. Aside of appearances, the RPG content, battle mechanics and character development are a nice niche. The chat needs a little improvement and the server connections are unstable; I often get a connection timed-out which is quite an inconvenience. Overall, I really enjoy the gameI'm looking forward to more outfits and new characters released in the future.

Made in-app purchase but item never arrived in game. Contacted developer and issue was never resolved. It's been over 1.5 weeks and I'm still waiting to see results on the issue. The most I've seen is a couple emails and a review reply. If you contact the developer, don't expect any swift responses and definitely don't expect the issue to be fixed. They either need to give me in game compensation, or give me my money back. I can't believe their "investigation" is taking this long

I've been having the same issues as some other users. It's been working just fine for the past few days, but I tried to play it today and it won't go anywhere past 71%. I would really like to stay on the server I've been on than start all over on a new one.

I love this game for it concept and content but it hasnt functioned correctly on any phone ive attempted to play on.  Currently, upon game loading up, i go to start and it says "connection timed out" and wont connect to server. And says the same fore every server so I cant play. Would love to be able to play again!

Need more control of the characters in combat. Auto fight should be an option, so many fights I could have won if you let ME choose who they attack but instead the go for the person with the most health even tho there is a guy who could die but the enemy always focuses on the weakest... it's annoying.. fix it.

In Gaydorado, you can explore their diverse lives by unlocking the chapters one by one.„ÄÄ‚òÖ Fashionable Dress Up, Flaunt Your StyleAs a dress up mobile game, Gaydorado counts with hundreds of fashionable, even high-fashion clothing in game. descriptionHTML:
Gaydorado is a social RPG and dress-up game, containing different storylines designed respectively for different characters, and powerful social system for gay people to get together. You can also create your own fashion styles by dressing up with hundreds of chic clothing. Join this fantastic LGBT community, download it for FREE!
　
------ Game Features------
★ Exclusive Storylines, Diverse Life Experiences
Gaydorado has different types of gay characters, and creates several exclusive storylines for gay people. It tells romantic stories between men with thrilling and action-packed plots. In Gaydorado, you can explore their diverse lives by unlocking the chapters one by one.
　
★ Fashionable Dress Up, Flaunt Your Style
As a dress up mobile game, Gaydorado counts with hundreds of fashionable, even high-fashion clothing in game. You can dress like a humble student, a fussy designer, a wise engineer, etc. Just unleash your imagination, flaunt your unique dress style. Cannot find a satisfying one? Tell Gaydorado your ideas via the contact email at the bottom.
　
★ Various Gameplay, Meet Different Needs
In addition to the fascinating storyline and fashionable dress up game, Gaydorado also has a Gym for players to increase their battle power, PVP arena to show off your strength, and a dating system to intimately interact with characters in game. Besides, a marriage system will be added in the future, which will allow you to date with real players and even become a happy couple.
Most importantly, Gaydorado hopes its players can find belongingness in game, since most of the players in game might be gay or support gay groups. Gaydorado pays great attention to its social system. Although it only provides global & private chatrooms to players for now, the LBS system will be added in the near future.
　

------Gameplays------
-Exclusive Storylines: unlock plots by winning stage battles and completing story tasks
-Gym System: increase battle power by getting fit and leveling skills
-PVP System: fight other players with charming fight power
-Dating System: intimately interact with characters in game


================
Like us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/Gaydorado-431511437232125/
Customer Service Email: gaydorado@service.cocobear.games

title: Gaydorado

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

Not bad for free. Minimal ads. The two drawbacks are that in career mode, the game is slanted in the opponents favour too much. And in 1 on 1, it takes forever to load an opponent. Fix that and I would give it a five star rating. Also, it would be nice to see the developer actually respond to some people's concerns.

comments: This is how to describe it: a game with worse graphics, sound effects, level design (the colors are way worse, like compare grassland in both games), and music. Or update flappy golf. Just please respond... the music is good, but the sound effects are absolute GARBAGE. They sound so cheap, and the music isn't even looped correctly. Add music tracks from the first game, and have a setting where we can pixelize the game like the first. It was supposed to sound retro, but you guys ruined it. So please fix this!!!

The game itself is really good but could you please add a local multiplayer feature for this android version üòä If this was an option I think more people would download it because at the moment it's a bit annoying that I can't connect to my friends on an iphone Thankyou.
I love this game but can you make it possible for local multiplayer with IOS users. All my other friends have IOS/Mac.

I like how there is a great campaign, and many hours of single play time, but the multiplayer, which is the best aspect of the IOS edition, does not support cross play, I would give a higher star rating if they added local cross play from android to ios. descriptionHTML:
Power Hover: Cruise is a spin-off from highly popular Power Hover game.
Futuristic racer with super stylish graphics and large roster of characters to choose from! Fly the UFO and other vehicles or just cruise with variety of robots!

Make your longest run in seven challenging endless stages! Randomly generated hazards will make sure that you will newer meet the same sequence twice! Outrun your friends or take over the world on the leaderboards!

MACHINE: Race after a crazed machine in a deep underground tunnel. Ride on the floor, walls or ceiling and avoid the lazers and spiky things!

AIR: Go for a ride among the clouds and take on the wildly spinning machinery. Spin spin!

PYRAMID: Lazers, jump ramps, moving walls and rotating spikes! Ancient tomb made for riding fast!

DIVE: Descent into the darkness, fluorescent lights guide the way as you spiral out of control on this underwater tunnel full of rotating hazards!

METRO: Do the zigzag in this super fast city track. Avoid all the spiky, rotating and moving things while you’re at it!

HALFPIPE: Ride on the halfpipe hitting thought tiny gaps and avoiding spike-balls and moving lasers!

TUNNEL: It's never ending darkness here! Slow-motion collectables makes your riding easier (or not)!

Wonderfull places for a nice Sunday ride!


FEATURES
• 7 unique endless stages with leaderboards
• 13 characters, robots and vehicles
• Unlock items in a game gallery
• Google Play Achievements
• Cloud saving support
• An original soundtrack

Oddrok - © 2018 Oddrok. All Rights Reserved.

descriptionHTML:
Ice craft Game, your goal is to survive. Feel like a square head ghost. Experience fear an deep horrifying atmosphere. Exploration of randomly generated cube abondoned, build and create amazing and perfect things from the simplest of creepy homes to the grandest of cube fortresses.

Create unique houses, decorate them for the holiday with various elements of decor and interior in the style of "Ice Craft". Cultivate a pumpkin and show the whole city what you are waiting for this holiday.
- Exciting adventures in 3d cube world.
- A sandbox game with beautiful graphics.
- Get resources, craft items and weapons, build a house and farms.
- Try to survive in survival mode.
summary: Ice Craft is a crafting and survival game, Enjoy !

comments: Only given a 1 star so the devs hurry up and get the game working again or else it would be a 5 star. This is the best game on play store currently and square Enix have done a brilliant job. No complaints... No p2w... and the graphics if you set them to full are just phenomenal!!! Keep it up guys!! But fix the loading issue so we can get back to akademia!!

Great game so far. Not sure if there is a community forum or something somewhere which would be nice. I had a character on some other server and it seemed to be erased when the new server opened? Its fine though, previous character did not have too much progression. Music is not the greatest though, would be good if you could include more classic FF music in the game.   Dailys seem a bit overwhelming. There are so many quests to complete each day to get all the chests.   Other than that im quite enjoying it. If you can't load the game after update clear data and dl again

Support is incredibly slow, they will happily take your money and not let you have access to the items you payed for. Will update this review if they ever actually resolve my issue. It has been 5 days since I submitted a support issue with no useful responses made by them. Update: over 48 hours since last response still not any closer to having my issue resolved

What the FFFFF?!! OG FFA version sucks! Yesterday, the daily rewards said that i only had 1 day till caetuna, and the next day came it gave me different hero rewards, 2 star legendary supports and telling me that i have 6 days till caetuna!!. U messed up this games.   And one more thing, the u-pick hero chest i got yesterday from daily rewards has gone when i restarted the game, tho i didnt get the chance to open it !! !!!

I installed the game. I was enjoying it then suddenly it stoped working giving me an error message of "license stoped working". I uninstalled it and will try to install it. I hope this time it won't happen again.   What?? Still having the same error! Please do something about it, since the game is really nice.

I was hooked up playing this game as you can still get stronger without spending. Unfortunately looks like something broke during the update and was stucked in the FF splash screen. Hoping that the devs are on top of this and release an official announcement to players.
description: „ÄêGame Introduction„Äë:An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.„ÄêFeatures„Äë:-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0‚Äôs console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
descriptionHTML:
【Game Introduction】:

An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)

Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.

【Features】:

-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0’s console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.

-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.

-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.

-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.

Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/
Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
developerAddress: 1 Queen's Road Central, Hong Kong
recentChanges: The bugs on account connecting and switching are fixed.
summary: The Sole SQUARE ENIX Official Licensed "Final Fantasy" Action Game
title: Final Fantasy Awakening: SE Licensed

comments: Uninstalling!!! Took less than 24 hrs to take 300 million i won away. Payed off great for the first 20 levels. I was thinking "finally a slot that pays!" Sat and played it for hours straight to try and build up the bank. Made it to level 23 and the game just stopped paying. I know you want us to make purchases but how is anyone going to want to purchase if it just depletes your winnings that fast. I'm done!!

Beautiful graphics,  smooth layout and really tough to move on to next challenges. Game doesn't payout as huge as it seems.  Overall fun to play and challenging for a slot game. Want a game to kill time, literally,  this it. Enjoy and good luck! Update..OK so I spent 5 diamonds to try and get extra spins which I did and won 30 free spins, I was betting 250k and won a whopping 1.5 mill out of 30 spins. Really? Come on! I understand greed but 30 spins and won what was equivalent to 7 free spins. Sheesh this is suppose to be fun right? Played the latest table for almost an hour on all bets and NOT 1 bonus game. GL all you will need it. Make sure bring your lucky rabbits foot.
This game gives a new perspective to "slots".  Im still not 100% sure if i like it or not; although, the "token" start AND  payouts are rather good. Its a worthy opponent to regular slot games!

I was really digging this game, until... It would appear that once you win a specified amount on free spins you can no longer win. I had 50 free spins won 4mill in the first 10 then won nothing on the  next 40 spins.

Worst slot game I've ever played, went instantly to the delete pile. Wouldn't play this game ever again if you paid me too. Anyone who gave this app a positive rating was probably a relative or paid to do so.
I've had this game for about two months and I've played it every day, that is until my phone broke, went crazy not be able to play it. best slot game I've ever played.

comments: I wasn't expecting to like this game. But I LOVE it. I don't generally like FPS games and although that's a considerable part of this game, there's so much more. I love the horse racing and the mini quests that take you on scavenger hunts, exploring the two giant maps! I'm a big fan of the Old West and I'm a big fan of this game too. I've had it for about a year now and it still isn't old. The multiplayer is really fun too. Great game, especially for the (nonexistent) price!

Its a very addicting game! Good for a use of passing time by. Needs some work on mobile controls tho. But over all, its a fasinating game! üòÄ Has GREAT graphics and a spectacular gameplay! But, getting silver stars is just WAY to hard. There is almost NO possible way to get them. Please add more ways to get them. Like finishing certain missions.

Its great game but some of the issue that i dont like in this game is the stars. Its hard to gaining them plus its not free overall need to purchase! My guns is out of ammo and i was force to buy and it was not free. Also slots are expensive! Are you guys want to steal money from us or want us to play? I want it free to play overall. Please make the game more realistic than ever also graphic make it high detailed. Plus it crashed often when im playing what the heck is that?? Thank you. You guys did a great job but just that. Make that improvement please then i will enjoy the game fully without any payment made.

I would like to work with you guys, I got lots of ideas to help improve it and or make a new game.  Also there seems to be problems with the multi-player function, it was working two days ago and then it stopped,  and when I try liking on Facebook for 2 sherif stars it doesn't complete the action. descriptionHTML:
Explore a truly enormous and open Wild West frontier full of cowboys, bandits and more…unnatural enemies in this third person shooter adventure game.

Play for free: Make your enemies pay!

Buck Crosshaw never shot a man who didn’t deserve it, but now he’s an outlaw who had to fake his own death and escape to Arizona. But in escaping one evil, Buck is about to face another, for an ancient and wicked force stirs in the hills of this mysterious region.

A WILD FRONTIER
Freely explore an open world set in Arizona and Oregon full of events, mystery and challenges for you to discover as you become completely immersed in the story and the action. But don’t be fooled by this land’s beauty - outlaws, vampires & many other unnatural foes lurk in every shadow.

ACCEPT THE CHALLENGE
Take on 40 missions with a great variety of tasks for you to overcome. You’ll race horses, take out robbers, fend off waves of enemies and more along the way!

SADDLE UP
In this kill-or-be-killed land, you’ll need to unlock all 8 different horses, 19 weapons and a wide selection of clothes, ammo and other items to help you on your adventure.

PLAY FOR FREE
Free games have never been this deep or fun! It costs you nothing to download and play the game to the end!

For fans of FPS, action games, shooting games, action games free Android games.

----

comments: This is a very entertaining game that is simple to play. It has provided me with hours of fun! The only thing is that I wish there were more combinations, there are things I've tried that you'd think would make something but don't. For example, Crayon (or Pencil, or Charcoal, or Paint) + Paper does not make Art.

This game is pretty addicting. I get stuck sometimes but I always find something new.  Small issue though, I it won't let me pull rust out onto the screen for some reason. I've used it before, but now it won't let me use it anymore. Perhaps it is an issue with my phone rather than a glitch in the app.

This is leagues better than the original alchemy game. There were a lot of bugs but they've all more or less been patched out. It took me 2 months of playing everyday to get all of the items and combinations cleared.

The interface is not so good. Big icons are not convenient, we have to scroll down long everytime, I could only imagine how much effort would it take if I had 500 items discovered. Please make icons small or a different tab just for icons or just make it like little alchemy one.

I love this game so much. I'm stuck on trying to make life but it's not frustrating it's challenging and I like it. Also, for all the people getting pissed off because the items disappear and you cant 'use' them anymore it's because you can't combine them with anything anymore so it is put in your encyclopedia so that doesn't waste space for the things you can use, it's actually a very smart game mechanic. I'm pretty sure it even says that in the tutorial. I also like how they didn't take the same combination formulas from the first game and instead added new ways to achieve the same product in a more realistic way, also there is so many items to create! So I think that this is an all around great game. Good job developers. Good job indeed.

Its a cool game. If you press the hint button it gives you a choice to watch a ad for help. I am not seeing in-app purchases so far and I have had this game for a while! I recommend this but not the other version. It gets a tiny bit boring after a while though. overall, GREAT GAME! Whoever made this game is great! :) :) :)

comments: A fun game to play with family. Works usually well with a couple random lag spots, not gamebreaking. However, last few days the game had no audio or video (Just a loading screen with chat). The questions and answers showed up but it kind of ruins the experience. Also maybe too American-based for a global game. Most people don't pay attention to American colleges.
All my extra lives disappeared overnight! The game is fun but why would they take my hard work away by removing the rewards I gained by helping them? No explanation for why this happened ü§®

It has a major bug: My extra lives flit in and out of existence. Today they don't show up, but two days ago I had 5, and the day installed the app, I had none, so that's kind of a major problem  Update: Emailed HQ Support, still haven't gotten those extra lives back. ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø

HQ is fun but the Android app does have issues. My wife's iPhone syncs the audio and video correctly and works great. My audio is not synced with the video. If I mute mine, my wife's audio is in sync with mine though. The biggest problem I have is that the game sometimes locks up during play. That mean you time it on the question and automatically are eliminated. Only happened a couple times but it can be frustrating.

Cool concept. However, extra lives seen to disappear forever after one game. I signed my dad up with my referral code a few days ago and received an extra life, but I haven't seen it since. That's pretty annoying.

Despite what the head of HQ says, this is still a beta. It's not on par with the iOS version, lots of things missing like the weekly free life,  high score display when you get eliminated, winner animations, and video inside the question timer. The current Android screenshots show the video inside the timer. ü§î
description: HQ is the live trivia game show with cash prizes. Every day at 9pm EST. Weekdays at 3pm EST.

comments: It's a fun addictive game the controls are great I kind don't like the pixel art style, but so many customizations for you charecters is awesome. I love it and I'm not even a boxing fan!

I think its a great looking game, with great thought out gameplay. Despite this, there are some issues about the game, I would like to address.  1. The controls for the dodge are a bit iffy. Sometimes when I slide in the right place to dodge, it would to a lower punch, and get myself hit. I don't mind the slide to dodge mechanic, it just may need some tinkering  2. I wish the fighters had some unique moves, you know. To give some diversity in them. Or unique traits.   That's about it. If you want to reply you can. Other then this, this is a good game.

Being a fan of combat sports I'm very picky when it comes to games that emulate said sport. But I have to say, I'm absolutely in love with this game. The controls are straight forward and smooth. Graphics are beautifully created and fit the gameplay style well. This is also not a total button masher and does require some skill to read and figure out opponent patterns. The things I would like added would be more character customization (beards, hair, fightstyle) and maybe an extended career (amateurs, different organizations). Those listed above aren't very important, but I would enjoy those additions. Good job to those who created this game, This is a nearly perfect game in my eyes.

I believe this game is absolutely amazing the face that they let you calibrate the sensitivity, button placement, Ability to have your own creativity with your fighter pure geneous I love how the developers take the time to listen to reviews and fix bugs! Great job guys.... P.S. I wasn't trying to dick ride but I love this gameüò≠üò≠

Graphics are incredible, I absolutely love pixel games. It has a striking resemblance to Mike Tyson's Punchout, which I've always wanted to play. I found a spelling error on the level 2 skills, no big deal just wanted to tell you. Love the controls, I use buttons because dodging is a little difficult on swipe mode, maybe make it a little more sensitive, It's hard to dodge if your swipe fails to dodge. Character customization is awesome, maybe add shirts, or at least tank tops. Also I love the lack of ads, it really makes the game more professional. Pvp mode would be cool also, I'm excited for that update, and more updates. I will continue to support you, keep working hard on this game! Also, it would be cool if you could make it windows 10 compatible on pc.

This is a great game but their are a few problems we really want online like NOW plz also me and my brother want cool stuff to put on your character like a mask (a fox and a wolf plz) and more bosses that's all. So far a gr8 game. P.s I have more ideals for the game. For PVP if you add face wear like glass they break if you get the blood lost and next round their fix with tape or something (make sure it's MLG glasses) also some neck wear to like gold chains for $50 and other stuff to thank you for writing back to me
description: Prizefighters is the latest and greatest free arcade boxing game to hit the Play Store featuring an in-depth career, player progression and customization, and fast action gameplay with intuitive fight controls.Named as one of TOUCH ARCADE'S BEST GAMES OF 2017 - "Working your way up the ranks and buffing out your custom boxer is incredibly fun and the core mechanics are so good"RETRO GRAPHICS AND SOUNDHand animated pixel art graphics bring you back to the classic arcade boxing games of the past. Fight in landscape or portrait mode!INGENIOUS CONTROLSPunch, block, dodge, and knock out your opponent with intuitive touch controls designed specifically for mobile devices. Fight with a variety of different boxing attacks including jabs, crosses, hooks, uppercuts, counters, and devastating body blows.EXTENSIVE CAREERStart from the bottom and fight your way up the ranks against 29 other randomly generated opponents. Challenge three different titleholders and become the greatest undisputed boxing champion of the world.PLAYER AND RING CUSTOMIZATIONMake a name for yourself by creating and customizing your own fighter with a variety of different hairstyles and attire colors. Choose the colors of your boxing ring canvas, ropes, and poles.FIGHTING SKILLS AND STATS PROGRESSIONMold your fighter by upgrading six different stat ratings that dictates your performance in the ring. Earn experience and level up to unlock new unique boxing abilities that can give you an edge over your opponent.SOCIAL FEATURESShare replays of your greatest knockouts and participate in engaging discussions with the boxing game community.UPCOMING CONTENTPrizefighters is constantly being updated with free content and has much more planned features including online multiplayer against real human opponents to keep you on your toes.Join the multiplayer beta today!https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.koalitygame.prizefighters
descriptionHTML:
Prizefighters is the latest and greatest free arcade boxing game to hit the Play Store featuring an in-depth career, player progression and customization, and fast action gameplay with intuitive fight controls.

Named as one of TOUCH ARCADE'S BEST GAMES OF 2017 - "Working your way up the ranks and buffing out your custom boxer is incredibly fun and the core mechanics are so good"

RETRO GRAPHICS AND SOUND
Hand animated pixel art graphics bring you back to the classic arcade boxing games of the past. Fight in landscape or portrait mode!

INGENIOUS CONTROLS
Punch, block, dodge, and knock out your opponent with intuitive touch controls designed specifically for mobile devices. Fight with a variety of different boxing attacks including jabs, crosses, hooks, uppercuts, counters, and devastating body blows.

EXTENSIVE CAREER
Start from the bottom and fight your way up the ranks against 29 other randomly generated opponents. Challenge three different titleholders and become the greatest undisputed boxing champion of the world.

PLAYER AND RING CUSTOMIZATION
Make a name for yourself by creating and customizing your own fighter with a variety of different hairstyles and attire colors. Choose the colors of your boxing ring canvas, ropes, and poles.

FIGHTING SKILLS AND STATS PROGRESSION
Mold your fighter by upgrading six different stat ratings that dictates your performance in the ring. Earn experience and level up to unlock new unique boxing abilities that can give you an edge over your opponent.

SOCIAL FEATURES
Share replays of your greatest knockouts and participate in engaging discussions with the boxing game community.

UPCOMING CONTENT
Prizefighters is constantly being updated with free content and has much more planned features including online multiplayer against real human opponents to keep you on your toes.

Join the multiplayer beta today!
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.koalitygame.prizefighters

As he fights against them, his strength and skill grows.Your job is simple - survive.‚ñ† FeaturesKill zombies and collect Gold to upgrade teammates and various installations - to kill more zombies!Simply tap to fire your gun.Your tapping speed determines the firing speed.Hire teammates to increase chance of survival in this world of despair.Experience this simple, yet strategic game!‚ñ† InfoYou can use auto-fire when you reach a certain level.There are various skills that can save you from critical situation.Every teammate has different weapons, with unique attributes.Kill zombies for Gold. descriptionHTML:
■ Survival mode unlocked!
■ New items, stages and zombies!
■ Adjusted difficulty level.

■ Synopsis
Once an ordinary man, Peter is left to survive in midst of a zombie apocalypse. As he fights against them, his strength and skill grows.
Your job is simple - survive.

■ Features
Kill zombies and collect Gold to upgrade teammates and various installations - to kill more zombies!

Simply tap to fire your gun.
Your tapping speed determines the firing speed.

Hire teammates to increase chance of survival in this world of despair.

Experience this simple, yet strategic game!

■ Info
You can use auto-fire when you reach a certain level.
There are various skills that can save you from critical situation.
Every teammate has different weapons, with unique attributes.
Kill zombies for Gold. Use the Gold to upgrade teammates and maintain the camp.
Offensive or deffensive? It all depends on your choice.
As days pass zombies become stronger, and they will become even more powerful during night time.
Collect various inventory items for additional strength.
It's a good idea to check the type of item each Boss yields.
Mine is a very powerful weapon with devastating damage.
When barricade is breached, zombies can attack your teammates.
Nuke will restart the game, but you'll keep inventory items.
When you have an inventory item, obtain another identical item to upgrade it.
If the game is too hard, try again from the start with your inventory items by using Nuke.
There's a massive Last Boss waiting for you.

■ This game saves player data in device. Deleting the app will terminate all save data.

title: 100 DAYS - Zombie Survival

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for a series of FUN and ADDICTIVE word puzzle challenges! I Love Word is the ultimate brain teaser word puzzle game designed for all ages. Try it and you won’t be able to put your phone down! Don’t believe it? Accept the challenge and see for yourself!

HOW TO PLAY
· Connect letters to form words and find all the words to complete each level.
· Finding starred hidden words for gold coins.
· Can’t think of a word? Don’t worry, tips are there to help you.
· Clear levels and find hidden words for gold coins to unlock content and more tips.

FEATURS
· PLAY AND LEARN – No matter what language background you’re from, I Love Word can let you have incredible fun and improve your English!

· EXPAND VOCABULARY – Both adults and kids can maintain and expand their vocabulary while having great fun!

· KIDS FRIENDLY – The beginning levels are relatively easy, so kids can start with ease, and play and learn new words at the same time.

· FAMILY AND FRIENDS – Playing with family and friends can be even more fun! gather more brain power, and have fun solving incredible and addictive word puzzles!

· 2000+ LEVELS – There are more than 2000 levels, and each is getting more challenging!

· ANYTIME ANYWHERE – There’s no time limit for each level; you can play anytime, anywhere, and progress will be saved automatically.

Download for FREE now and become the WORD MASTER!

I loved this game and found it very fun. As someone who is currently learning Java, I can vouch that it's not as easy as it may seem, to make a full fledged game like this. I appreciate that the developer would not overflow it with ads but instead make it a choice to see ads in exchange for in game benefits. I think this game should get more attention

I'm an avid music gamer and I have to say for a mobile game it's graphics and choice of music is very nice. However, the reason I don't give it 5 stars is I was expecting the nodes that you collect or other gamplay aspect to be in tune with the music, like say button pressing games like tap tap sonic etc where you press the button in time with the music. The fact this game doesn't do that is a little off putting and I'm not sure how much I would play this game for that reason. Maybe they will implement this in later updates. The option to buy almost everything with in game currency rather than real money is a bonus, give you reason to play it more because you know you can unlock songs etc without forking your own money. Overall though still a good game!

description: There‚Äôs a party in space - and you‚Äôre invited! In collaboration with award-winning Hello There Games, Avicii proudly presents hit music game AVICII GRAVITY HD, where you can experience Avicii's latest and greatest hits through compelling and atmospheric gameplay.  In fast-paced AVICII GRAVITY HD, Avicii's galactic hits merge with intense gameplay into a uniquely immersive experience - and YOU decide how it all plays out! Your progress determines how the melodies build up, while the environment changes to match the music. Swipe, push and power up your ships to maximize your rides! Enter a flow-like state and ride through endless, artistic environments inspired by Avicii hits. Earn credits to unlock new ships, environments and power-ups. Better yet, you can access and immerse yourself in a variety of Avicii songs - in ways attainable only through this game. Preparing to play is exciting in itself, as slot machines determine the tokens and power-ups you receive for your next ride. Also, the store is loaded with consumables, credits and hit songs. And finally, daily challenges and achievements unlock new ships and upgrades, and will have you coming back for more!

comments: Great game. Beautiful, if not repetitive graphics. Gameplay is pretty easy to pick up, but overall satisfying. There is definitely a pay to win wall if you don't get lucky with your initial packs/first rare ruby deck.  My advice - always buy fusion stones as soon as they come up in store. After your first 25 ruby pack, save up for the 50 one.

Amazing game, really well made, mechanics are simple yet extremely fun and the graphic style is great! A few small things to ask for tho, firstly can the timer be increased a little, especially because different animations take up longer time and u can't play during this time, and also that certain cards, mainly all those that deal face damage, pls be balanced as they can be a mindless way to win, especially things such as needle bomb. Other than these minor things, I've had an amazing time playing, keep it up üòÉ

Great app with epic graphics and ideas. Like the different Kingdoms you can build your deck from and the cards are all cool. The only thing I would like changed is where you have one enemy you want to take out, but there is another enemy on the other side and it forces you to attack the other enemy like it's in the way or something. Please change this and it would be great to have a way of directing you troops as they are placed, e.g, left or right or forwards, which thing you attack and so on. But other than that, I think it's am amazing, original game and I would recommend getting it.

Well, I personally think it's pretty great, but it's not for everyone. The mechanics seemed wonky to me at the start, but as I got more cards and built a better deck, everything fell into place, and I began to enjoy it much more. The artwork is absolutely stunning, and I really love the style. The same goes for the soundtrack. If you're reading this, I say give it a try, and play for about a week, if you still don't like it, that's fine, but the game deserves a chance.

This game is not only incredibly pretty but also addictively fun to play. The card art is perfect and the minimalist design works brilliantly. The games tend to be a little on the longer side but there is plenty of challenge to appease newbies and ccg veterans alike

The "command" and "border" functions don't always work properly which means the game is lacking when it comes to good programming. The "you can upgrade this card if you happen to collect duplicates of it" system has been proven to be unfriendly and the companies who use it are usually just greedy. Not to mention that you have to use gold to upgrade cards as well. If you want a simpleton's money-grabbing game, dig in. Oh, and time consuming as well, enjoy the grind.
description: Immerse yourself in the rich world of Stormbound, as four kingdoms struggle for dominance. Construct a deck of unique and powerful cards and then dive into real-time battles against other players. Novel gameplay combines your favorite aspects of collectible card games with the tactical strategy of board games. Play cards from your hand to the game board and then watch your units march on the enemy base.FEATURES: *Tactical gameplay that rewards the most clever strategists*Real-time PVP battles against players all around the globe*Dozens of powerful cards to collect and upgrade!*Incredible 2D and 3D art immerses you in the world of Stormbound*Four distinct kingdoms with unique advantages and playstylesPlease Note: Stormbound: Kingdom Wars is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

description: This game made for you so don't wait to discover it.Happy strong wheel adventures is an amazing games, it's the time to start the most addictive game of all times ! It's the time to start playing it!Happy strong wheel adventures is a free game, full of adventures.Happy Wheels is an obstacle rag-doll extreme sports game, your goals is to reach the finish line, you will encounter various obstacles that can damageyour character.Happy Wheels is a fun and free game is fairly easy to understand and play.When you get bored with your office work , sitting at the table is just full of paper . Why not have a rolling down the hill under blue sky with csrbike race game on the bicycle wheel?.Drive your bike into a very happy adventure racing under hot sky.Welcome to Happy Wheels A very happy csr bike race game. You will be a racing biker drive your wheel in the hot racing , your task is tap screen to dashand rolling down the hill, crossing the river, under shining sky and then go finished . Sometime you run like a dumb guy, just find the ways to die.Keep in your mind alway drive ahead, no return, it just dash ahead and ahead , waiting for a little fortune.. If just a small dumb mistake or you‚Äôre nota fortune man, many ways to die, your csr bike will be destroyed as a torn piece of paper by the death race.Tap the forward button to dash, tap turn left or turn right button to rotate your wheel in the air . When encountering obstacles tap stop buttonto decrease the speed. All you need is timing to tap the buttons and a little fortune.This game is a rag-doll extreme csr sports game. Experience the real physics based racing game on your phone, Happy Wheels offers an exhilaratingmix of amazing tracks, a little of fortune and deadly challenges. Feel the dash speed as you negotiate your way through the deadly survival courses.Perform death defying wild stunts, witness bone cracking impacts and lose a limb or few, and take it to the extreme!Experience the feeling of rolling down the hill under blue sky with bike race is wonderful, drive rolling ahead the hill, dash crossing the mountain,paper flower is falling in the road. Or just like a dumb guy drive the csr bike to the dumb racing and find the ways not to die. Rolling down a hillunder the hot sky,your wheel is hot , your legs so tired, just one way is drive ahead and a little fortune, but there are many hill to rolling,mountain to climb, river to cross and.. many ways to die. So hard but so fun. .Time to jump on your wheel and racing with Happy Wheels game.Happy Wheels is a rag-doll physics Arcade & extreme sports Racing game in which you can jump off buildings, crush the glass & avoid obstacles & spikesand arrowHappy Wheels an exciting game with sadistic inclinations and black humor. The essence of the game is extremely simple: you have to get to oneof the vehicles to the finish. The problem is that not every part of your body will get along with you. descriptionHTML:
This game made for you so don't wait to discover it.
Happy strong wheel adventures is an amazing games, it's the time to start the most addictive game of all times ! It's the time to start playing it!
Happy strong wheel adventures is a free game, full of adventures.

Happy Wheels is an obstacle rag-doll extreme sports game, your goals is to reach the finish line, you will encounter various obstacles that can damage
your character.
Happy Wheels is a fun and free game is fairly easy to understand and play.

When you get bored with your office work , sitting at the table is just full of paper . Why not have a rolling down the hill under blue sky with csr
bike race game on the bicycle wheel?.Drive your bike into a very happy adventure racing under hot sky.
Welcome to Happy Wheels A very happy csr bike race game. You will be a racing biker drive your wheel in the hot racing , your task is tap screen to dash
and rolling down the hill, crossing the river, under shining sky and then go finished . Sometime you run like a dumb guy, just find the ways to die.
Keep in your mind alway drive ahead, no return, it just dash ahead and ahead , waiting for a little fortune.. If just a small dumb mistake or you’re not
a fortune man, many ways to die, your csr bike will be destroyed as a torn piece of paper by the death race.
Tap the forward button to dash, tap turn left or turn right button to rotate your wheel in the air . When encountering obstacles tap stop button
to decrease the speed. All you need is timing to tap the buttons and a little fortune.
This game is a rag-doll extreme csr sports game. Experience the real physics based racing game on your phone, Happy Wheels offers an exhilarating
mix of amazing tracks, a little of fortune and deadly challenges. Feel the dash speed as you negotiate your way through the deadly survival courses.
Perform death defying wild stunts, witness bone cracking impacts and lose a limb or few, and take it to the extreme!
Experience the feeling of rolling down the hill under blue sky with bike race is wonderful, drive rolling ahead the hill, dash crossing the mountain,
paper flower is falling in the road. Or just like a dumb guy drive the csr bike to the dumb racing and find the ways not to die. Rolling down a hill
under the hot sky,your wheel is hot , your legs so tired, just one way is drive ahead and a little fortune, but there are many hill to rolling,
mountain to climb, river to cross and.. many ways to die. So hard but so fun. .
Time to jump on your wheel and racing with Happy Wheels game.
Happy Wheels is a rag-doll physics Arcade & extreme sports Racing game in which you can jump off buildings, crush the glass & avoid obstacles & spikes
and arrow

Happy Wheels an exciting game with sadistic inclinations and black humor. The essence of the game is extremely simple: you have to get to one
of the vehicles to the finish. The problem is that not every part of your body will get along with you. Huge chainsaws, thorns, watermelons,
pineapples and many others want to tear off a piece from you!
Happy Wheels a game in which all you need to survive.

Download this super game on your phone and share this with your friends!!

Thank you!
summary: This game made for you so don't wait to discover it.
title: Happy strong wheel adventures

Beast is a game of football and it is a game of football and it is not possible for the game to be played with the players in the game.  Good game controls are set up for the game to play at a different location in Liverpool and Wales and the club has won the championship.

I absolutely loved the game, enough so to even pay for no ads, but it got rid of my highscore, all my hats and outfits, all of my upgrades, and just started fresh. Now I have ads again and I can't get rid of them even though I payed to have them removed. I feel ripped off. Edit: just lost my progress for a second time

Great game, ads can be blocked without a connection to the internet, but if you're on a streak or attempting a challenge, using one for a continue is nice. I'm honestly addicted, shooting my little comrads to safety.

I truly enjoyed this game. I have been playing frequently for about two weeks. I loaded the game to continue farming for stars to see everything has been wiped as if I just freshly installed it. Seems I'm not the only one this has happened to. Developer: restore what other individuals and I have bought and achieved please. Very unhappy

This game does not have a casual mode so every time you play its time sensitive. This greatly reduced playability. Coupled with the most jerky aiming I have ever used brought this game down to a solid 2‚≠ê.
It's very fun but I have bccan improvement add a secret world like where u can go to the under world and the back ground is red and a few other things from the under world
description: Tired of always losing at Hangman?Now it's time to get back at that noose-wielding bully!Gibbets: Bow Master, the sequel to the smash hit, gives you a chance to save the hangman's victims before they run out of breath! A truly innovative arcade puzzler where you'll have to aim your bow and arrow carefully to cut the hangman's rope without hurting his victims! Use all manner of bonuses and pick ups, warps and teleports, to help you on your quest. Can you handle the frantic pace and save the innocent before they take their final breath?
descriptionHTML:

comments: Enjoyable game. Don't have to spend money on diamonds unless you're after a top look. Best played when linked to FB which means you can borrow from friends' closets. Would rate 5 stars but recently I am having issues opening results in my in box. Every time I receive a result the page opens halfway then I have to exit the game and reload. Playing on an Asus ZenPad, anyone having the same issue or have a solution pls?

I have been playing Covet for 4 yrs every single day! Being in the fashion industry I find it so interesting that the products you dress your models in are real items you can buy in real life. They have a great collection of brands but Im excited to see more.   And contrary to popular belief you dont have to spend a dime to play. My strategy for this is I play the daily challenge with either past seasonal clothes or i borrow from my fashion house. If your vision and outfit is great you will win the free item regardless of whether it is in season or not. By doing this you save $500 a day and i wait till a covet series comes along and play it till my heart and imagination is content.   Take it from a Covet junkie, you will be hooked for years!

This is the best fashion game by far however there are a few small issues. 1) the same people with the highest level of hair and make-up always win more than anyone 2) you need to win more diamonds and money given how much you have to spend on daily challenges and 3) you need a shopping cart option during challenges so you don't have to go back and find the last item you liked.  Its a great game of you can afford to by diamonds with your debit card.

Great pass time and fun to play. For a while I do nothing just for the daily diamonds but I don't mind because the game is just overall fun to play! Maybe it would be better ifyou earned more cash for entering style challenges but... STILL FUNüòâ

Best game EVER!! I love this game sooo much! The only problem is that you don't get to move on to the next level fast enough. I do hate that so much.And also e everything costs diamonds and u don't get alot of that.  But other than that, good game!! Highly recommended.

Loved the game when I first started to play. Beautiful clothes. Great model looks,  a LOT of fun. Until you get further in. Everything is so expensive and what you get for diamonds in a day is very little. It was disappointing to say the least. I had a few friends who played and could borrow from their closets but none of them play anymore. Probably for the same reason I am about to stop playing myself.Give better incentives and give better prizes and maybe I will play again. Bummed out, the game has great potential

descriptionHTML:
Show off your great style with Covet Fashion, the game for the shopping obsessed! Join millions of other fashionistas, discover clothing and brands you love, and get recognized for your style! Feed your shopping addiction and create outfits in this fashion game designed to hone your style skills. Express your unique style by shopping for fabulous items to fill your closet, putting together looks for different Style Challenges and voting on other players’ looks. Plus, win exclusive in-game prizes for looks that earn 4 stars or more!

SHOP THE BEST STYLES. We’ve partnered with brands like Calvin Klein, Rachel Zoe and Vince Camuto to bring you the latest fashions to obsess over. With over 175 brands to shop from you’re sure to discover styles you love.

STYLE THE PERFECT OUTFIT. Choose from thousands of glamorous clothing and accessory items in addition to chic hair and makeup styles on our new diverse array of models to create looks for various styling challenges such as photo shoots, cocktails and red carpet fittings.

VOTE ON WHO WORE IT BEST. Cast your vote and decide what’s hot on the Covet Fashion scene! Over hundreds of thousands of entries per styling challenge! Are other players’ looks 5-star worthy or did they miss the mark?

PLAY WITH FRIENDS. Want to get advice on your outfits or celebrate your wins? Join a Fashion House to make friends or connect to Facebook and chat about any and all things Covet Fashion.

Did you know you can shop your favorite Covet Fashion items in real life? All of the clothing and accessory items featured in the game link to places where you can buy them for your real-life closet. Not only can you discover new brands and trends, you can own them, too!

Download Covet Fashion now and start styling!

FOLLOW US
Instagram: instagram.com/covetfashion
Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/covetfashion
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CovetFashion
Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/covetfashion/

Payments FAQ:
Does Covet Fashion allow in-app payments?
Covet Fashion is a free-to-play app, but like many apps in the App Store, there is the option of purchasing in-app items using real money. Turn off in-app purchases on your device if you’d like to disable this feature.
